summary.span: 定義控制項的基底類別，它們屬於具視覺表示的元件。

span.span: Defines the base class for controls, which are components with visual representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立您自己的控制項類別，繼承自，類別，或從其他 Windows Form 提供控制項。To create your own control class, inherit from the , classes, or from the other Windows Forms provided controls. 如需有關如何撰寫自訂控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[開發自訂 Windows Form 控制項和.NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md)。For more information about authoring custom controls, see [Developing Custom Windows Forms Controls with the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md). 類別實作向使用者顯示資訊的類別所需的基本功能。The class implements very basic functionality required by classes that display information to the user. 它會處理透過鍵盤和指標裝置的使用者輸入。It handles user input through the keyboard and pointing devices. 它會處理訊息路由和安全性。It handles message routing and security. 雖然它不實作繪製，它會定義控制項 （其位置和大小） 的範圍。It defines the bounds of a control (its position and size), although it does not implement painting. 它提供的視窗控制代碼 (`hWnd`)。It provides a window handle (`hWnd`). Windows Form 控制項使用的環境屬性，讓子控制項可以看起來像是其周圍的環境。Windows Forms controls use ambient properties so child controls can appear like their surrounding environment. *環境屬性*是控制項的屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An *ambient property* is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 如果控制項沒有，而且未設定的屬性，控制會嘗試判斷透過環境屬性的值屬性。If the control does not have a , and the property is not set, the control attempts to determine the value of the ambient property through the property. 如果未設置控制項，如果站台不支援環境的屬性，或是在未設定的屬性，控制項就會使用預設值。If the control is not sited, if the site does not support ambient properties, or if the property is not set on the , the control uses its own default values. 通常，環境的屬性代表特性的控制項，例如，也就是傳遞給子控制項。Typically, an ambient property represents a characteristic of a control, such as , that is communicated to a child control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 所提供的環境屬性類別包括： ， ， ， ，和。Ambient properties provided by the class include: , , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 若要讓 Windows Form 應用程式支援視覺化樣式，請務必設定屬性`System`並包含與您可執行檔的資訊清單。To make your Windows Forms application support visual styles, be sure to set the property to `System` and include a manifest with your executable. 資訊清單是 XML 檔案所包含應用程式可執行檔內的資源，或是為位於與可執行檔相同的目錄中的個別檔案。A manifest is an XML file that is included either as a resource within your application executable or as a separate file that resides in the same directory as the executable file. 例如資訊清單中，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的列舉型別。For an example of a manifest, see the Example section of the enumeration. 如需有關使用視覺化樣式的詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺化樣式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb773187.aspx)。For more information about using visual styles, see[Visual Styles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb773187.aspx). Windows Form 有內建的協助工具支援，並提供可讓它使用協助工具用戶端應用程式，例如螢幕加大工具和公用程式時，螢幕小鍵盤，語音輸入公用程式，應用程式的相關資訊替代輸入的裝置，以及鍵盤加強公用程式。Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications such as screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities. 有時候您會想要提供給協助工具用戶端應用程式的其他資訊。Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications. 有兩種方式可以提供這項額外資訊。There are two ways of providing this additional information. 您可以設定， ， ，和會報告至協助工具用戶端應用程式的屬性值。You can set the , , , and property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications. 這個方法通常用於提供有限的協助工具資訊的現有控制項。This method is typically used to provide limited accessibility information for existing controls. 或者，您可以撰寫您自己的類別衍生自或類別，提供依需要盡可能協助工具資訊。Alternatively, you can write your own class deriving from the or classes, providing as much accessibility information as needed. > [!NOTE] > 若要維持較佳的效能，請勿在其建構函式中設定控制項的大小。To maintain better performance, do not set the size of a control in its constructor. 慣用的方法是覆寫屬性。The preferred method is to override the property. > [!NOTE] > 無法加入資料繫結其建構函式中。Do not add data bindings for a in its constructor. 這樣會導致程式碼產生錯誤，而且可能會導致不想要的行為。Doing so will cause errors in code generation and can cause unwanted behavior. 中的控制項的大部分命名空間使用基礎的 Windows 通用控制項做為基礎建立。The majority of the controls in the namespace use the underlying Windows common control as a base to build on. 如需 Windows 通用控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[一般控制項參考](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb775497.aspx)。For more information about the Windows common controls, see[General Control Reference](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/bb775497.aspx). 若要識別從不同的處理序的 Windows Form 控制項，使用標準`SendMessage`呼叫傳遞 WM_GETCONTROLNAME 訊息。To identify Windows Forms controls from a separate process, use a standard `SendMessage` call to pass the WM_GETCONTROLNAME message. WM_GETCONTROLNAME 無關的語言和 Windows 階層架構。WM_GETCONTROLNAME is independent of the language and Windows hierarchy. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 建議解決方案適用於 Windows Form 」 主題[自動化 Windows Form](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms996405.aspx)。For more information, see the "Recommended Solution for Windows Forms" topic in[Automating Windows Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms996405.aspx). 使用來同步處理從多個執行緒存取控制項的屬性。Use the property to synchronize access to the control from multiple threads. 如需多執行緒 Windows Form 控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 進行安全執行緒呼叫 Windows Form 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md)For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md)

threadsafe.span: 只有下列成員是安全執行緒： ， ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。

span.span: Only the following members are thread safe: , , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created.

threadsafe.span: 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。

span.span: Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須呼叫每個方法協助工具用戶端應用程式所收到的通知。You must call the method for each the accessibility client applications are to be notified of. 屬性時設定，或是從通常呼叫方法的事件處理常式。The method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler. 例如，您可能會呼叫方法並傳入值`Hide`從內的事件處理常式事件。For example, you might call the method and pass in an value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不會不含任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄示範呼叫方法。This code excerpt demonstrates calling the method. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要控制從這個方法傳回的執行個體，請覆寫方法。To control the instance returned from this method, override the method. 如果目前沒有為控制項指定 ，則會建立其新的執行個體。If no is currently assigned to the control, a new instance of one is created. > [!NOTE] > 取得或設定屬性，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`隨安裝組件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 如需可存取物件的詳細資訊，請參閱[Active Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592.aspx)。For more information about accessible objects, see [Active Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd373592.aspx).

span.span: The default action description of the control for use by accessibility client applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的屬性會描述從使用者的觀點來看操作物件的主要方法。An object's property describes the object's primary method of manipulation from the user's viewpoint. 這個屬性應該是動詞或短動詞片語。This property should be a verb or a short verb phrase. > [!NOTE] > 並非所有的物件有預設動作，而且有些物件可能會有相關的預設動作其屬性，如下列範例所示：Not all objects have default actions, and some objects might have a default action that is related to its property, such as in the following examples: - 選取的核取方塊具有 「 取消核取 」 的預設動作而值為 「 已核取 」。A selected check box has a default action of "Uncheck" and a value of "Checked." - 已清除核取方塊具有 「 檢查 」 的預設動作，值是 「 未核取 」。A cleared check box has a default action of "Check" and a value of "Unchecked." - 標記為 「 列印 」 的按鈕不有任何值 」 按下 」 的預設動作。A button labeled "Print" has a default action of "Press," with no value. - 標籤或文字方塊控制項，顯示"Printer"沒有預設動作，不過會有值為"Printer"。A label or a text box control that shows "Printer" has no default action, but would have a value of "Printer." 如需可存取物件的屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[內容的描述性屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx)。For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AccessibleDescription { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的屬性會提供有關物件的視覺外觀的文字描述。An object's property provides a textual description about an object's visual appearance. 描述主要是用來針對視力或眼盲的使用者，提供更大的內容，但也可以使用內容搜尋或其他應用程式。The description is primarily used to provide greater context for low-vision or blind users, but can also be used for context searching or other applications. 屬性描述不明顯，如果需要或者如果它是多餘根據物件的， ， ，和屬性。The property is needed if the description is not obvious, or if it is redundant based on the object's , , , and properties. 比方說，「 確定 」 按鈕就不需要其他資訊，但是顯示圖片的仙人掌的按鈕。For example, a button with "OK" would not need additional information, but a button that shows a picture of a cactus would. ，和(也可能) 仙人掌按鈕屬性會描述其用途，但屬性會傳達資訊是無形的例如"的按鈕顯示圖片的仙人掌。 」The , and (and perhaps ) properties for the cactus button would describe its purpose, but the property would convey information that is less tangible, such as "A button that shows a picture of a cactus." 如需可存取物件的屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[內容的描述性屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx)。For more information about properties of accessible objects, see [Content of Descriptive Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/dd318025.aspx). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體衍生的類別， `MyCheckBox`，將其指派至其屬性和集合和屬性，因為屬性是`null`。The following code example creates an instance of a derived class, `MyCheckBox`, assigns it an to its property and sets the and properties, because the property is `null`. 這個範例需要您有名為`MyForm`。This example requires that you have a named `MyForm`. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/CPP/controlaccessibility.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/CS/controlaccessibility.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject/VB/controlaccessibility.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會啟用卸除使用者將是影像或影像檔案拖曳至表單，並將其顯示在其上的點。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 表單繪製每次重新繪製影像會覆寫方法; 否則為映像就只會一直保存到下一步 重新繪製。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件處理方法判斷被拖曳至表單的資料類型，並提供適當的回應。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件處理方法會顯示在表單中，影像如果可以從資料建立。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因為和值螢幕座標，這個範例會使用方法，將它們轉換為用戶端座標。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義如何調整控制項大小的自動調整其父控制項大小時。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 錨定在其父控制項的控制項，可確保，錨定的邊緣仍保留在相同位置相對於邊緣父控制項的父控制項調整大小。Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized. 您可以錨定至一或多個邊緣與其容器控制項。You can anchor a control to one or more edges of its container. 比方說，如果您有與其屬性值設定為`Top`和`Bottom`、會延伸以維護的頂端和底端邊緣的錨定的距離為的會增加。For example, if you have a with a whose property value is set to `Top` and `Bottom`, the is stretched to maintain the anchored distance to the top and bottom edges of the as the of the is increased. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一個可以設定一次，最後一個設定的優先順序。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將至表單，並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 此範例錨定至表單的右下角的按鈕，以便調整表單大小時，則會保持其相對位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下來設定並調整大小的按鈕，以做為相同大小。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 範例接著會設定至`true`並設定屬性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最後，它會加入事件處理常式來處理按鈕的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 這個範例需要您有名為`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不支援透明的色彩，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`值設`true`。The property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of is set to `true`. 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定和預設系統色彩的控制項。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控制項的任何子控制項，則程式碼以遞迴方式呼叫其本身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 這個程式碼範例需要您具有與至少一個子系控制項; 不過，子容器控制，例如或，使用自己的子系控制項會進一步示範遞迴。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會為事件處理常式時執行屬性值變更。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數種方法具有名稱模式*PropertyName* `Changed`所引發的時機對應*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更至如果數值為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 這個範例需要您有包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會為事件處理常式時執行屬性值變更。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數種方法具有名稱模式*PropertyName* `Changed`所引發的時機對應*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更至如果數值為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 這個範例需要您有包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件屬性變更，以程式設計方式或使用者互動。This event is raised if the property changes either programmatically or by user interaction. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#9)]

summary.span: 在建立控制項基礎控制代碼的執行緒上執行非同步委派。

span.span: Executes a delegate asynchronously on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginInvoke(class System.Delegate method) cil managed
Public Function BeginInvoke (method As Delegate) As IAsyncResult

span.span: A delegate to a method that takes no parameters.

summary.span: 在建立控制項基礎控制代碼的執行緒上執行指定的非同步委派。

span.span: Executes the specified delegate asynchronously on the thread that the control's underlying handle was created on.

returns.span: ，表示 作業的結果。

span.span: An that represents the result of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會以非同步方式呼叫的委派，這個方法會立即傳回。The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately. 您可以從任何執行緒，即使擁有控制項的控制代碼的執行緒呼叫這個方法。You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle. 如果尚不存在的控制項控點，直到找到的控制項或表單沒有視窗控制代碼，這個方法會搜尋控制項的父鏈結。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到適當的控制代碼，將會擲回例外狀況。If no appropriate handle can be found, will throw an exception. 委派方法內的例外狀況被視為未截獲，且將會傳送至應用程式的設陷例外狀況處理常式。Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler. 您可以呼叫來擷取從委派的傳回值，如果 referencesteps，但這不是必要。You can call to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required. 將會封鎖，直到可以擷取傳回值。 will block until the return value can be retrieved. > [!NOTE] > 大部分控制項上的方法可以只會從呼叫執行緒建立控制項。Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created. 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 至於其他所有方法呼叫，您應該使用叫用方法的其中一個來封送處理控制項的執行緒的呼叫。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 叫用方法一定會叫用其控制項的執行緒上回呼。The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread. > [!NOTE] > 如果應該處理訊息的執行緒不再為作用中，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates a use of the method. [!code-cpp[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/CPP/control_begininvoke.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/CS/control_begininvoke.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Control_BeginInvoke#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_BeginInvoke/VB/control_begininvoke.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會以非同步方式呼叫的委派，這個方法會立即傳回。The delegate is called asynchronously, and this method returns immediately. 您可以從任何執行緒，即使擁有控制項的控制代碼的執行緒呼叫這個方法。You can call this method from any thread, even the thread that owns the control's handle. 如果尚不存在的控制項控點，直到找到的控制項或表單沒有視窗控制代碼，這個方法會搜尋控制項的父鏈結。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到適當的控制代碼，將會擲回例外狀況。If no appropriate handle can be found, will throw an exception. 委派方法內的例外狀況被視為未截獲，且將會傳送至應用程式的設陷例外狀況處理常式。Exceptions within the delegate method are considered untrapped and will be sent to the application's untrapped exception handler. 您可以呼叫來擷取從委派的傳回值，如果 referencesteps，但這不是必要。You can call to retrieve the return value from the delegate, if neccesary, but this is not required. 將會封鎖，直到可以擷取傳回值。 will block until the return value can be retrieved. > [!NOTE] > 大部分控制項上的方法可以只會從呼叫執行緒建立控制項。Most methods on a control can only be called from the thread where the control was created. 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 至於其他所有方法呼叫，您應該使用叫用方法的其中一個來封送處理控制項的執行緒的呼叫。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 叫用方法一定會叫用其控制項的執行緒上回呼。The invoke methods always invoke their callbacks on the control's thread. > [!NOTE] > 如果應該處理訊息的執行緒不再為作用中，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates a use of the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓接收輸入的焦點的控制項，控制項必須有指派的控制代碼和和屬性必須都設為`true`控制項和所有其父控制項和控制項必須是表單或控制項的最外層的父代必須是表單。In order for a control to receive input focus, the control must have a handle assigned to it, and the and properties must both be set to `true` for both the control and all its parent controls, and the control must be a form or the control's outermost parent must be a form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將焦點設定為指定，如果它能夠接收焦點。The following code example sets focus to the specified , if it can receive focus. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否捕捉住滑鼠。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control has captured the mouse.

value.span: 如果控制項捕捉住滑鼠，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control has captured the mouse; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當控制項捕捉住滑鼠時，在資料指標的框線內接收滑鼠輸入。When a control has captured the mouse, it receives mouse input whether or not the cursor is within its borders. 通常只有在拖曳作業時才會捕捉滑鼠。The mouse is typically only captured during drag operations. 前景視窗可以捕捉滑鼠。Only the foreground window can capture the mouse. 當背景視窗嘗試這樣做時，視窗會收到滑鼠游標位於視窗的可見部分時發生的滑鼠事件的訊息。When a background window attempts to do so, the window receives messages only for mouse events that occur when the mouse cursor is within the visible portion of the window. 此外，即使前景視窗已捕捉滑鼠，使用者仍然可以按一下另一個視窗中，將其帶至前景。Also, even if the foreground window has captured the mouse, the user can still click another window, bringing it to the foreground. 將滑鼠擷取，不應處理快速鍵。When the mouse is captured, shortcut keys should not work. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 在表單，其中包含執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼label1 和兩個名為listbox1 和 listbox2，名為控制項。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named label1 and two controls named listbox1 and listbox2. 確保表單和控制項的事件是在此範例中方法相關聯。Ensure the form and controls' event is associated with the method in this example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ControlCapture#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlCapture/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ControlCapture#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlCapture/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ControlCapture#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ControlCapture/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出控制項取得焦點時，是否會在任何需要驗證的控制項上執行驗證。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性設定為`false`、和事件都會被隱藏。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 屬性值通常設定為`false`的控制項，例如 [說明] 按鈕。The property value is typically set to `false` for controls such as a Help button. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別並驗證使用者輸入電子郵件地址。The following code example uses the derived class and validates an email address that the user enters. 如果電子郵件地址不是標準格式 (包含"@" and "。")，驗證失敗，圖示會顯示，而且在取消事件。If the email address is not in the standard format (containing "@" and "."), the validation fails, an icon is displayed, and the event is canceled. 在表單上按鈕的其中一個具有其屬性設定為`false`。One of the buttons on the form has its property set to `false`. 按一下，或將焦點設定為這個按鈕不會觸發驗證。Clicking or setting focus to this button does not trigger validation. 這個範例需要、控制項和在表單上建立。This example requires that a , an control, and a have been created on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#67](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#67)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#67](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#67)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式正在偵錯時，是否要攔截不該存取卻存取控制項 屬性之錯誤執行緒上的呼叫。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to catch calls on the wrong thread that access a control's property when an application is being debugged.

value.span: 如果會攔截錯誤執行緒上的呼叫，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if calls on the wrong thread are caught; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當建立控制項的執行緒以外的執行緒嘗試存取該控制項的方法或屬性的其中一個時，它通常會導致無法預期的結果。When a thread other than the creating thread of a control tries to access one of that control's methods or properties, it often leads to unpredictable results. 常見的無效的執行緒活動是存取控制項之錯誤執行緒上的呼叫屬性。A common invalid thread activity is a call on the wrong thread that accesses the control's property. 設定至`true`來尋找和偵錯時更輕鬆地診斷這個執行緒的活動。Set to `true` to find and diagnose this thread activity more easily while debugging.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Click As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件會傳遞至其事件處理常式，因此它只會顯示已發生按。The event passes an to its event handler, so it only indicates that a click has occurred. 如果您需要更多滑鼠資訊 （按鈕點選、 滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用事件。If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the event. 不過，如果按一下因滑鼠，例如按下 ENTER 鍵以外的其他動作，將不會引發事件。However, the event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key. 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以設定滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間應間隔多少時間才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 每次按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。The event is raised every time a control is double-clicked. 比方說，如果您有事件處理常式和事件、和按兩下表單時，會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the and events of a , the and events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果按兩下控制項時，以及控制項不支援事件，事件可能會引發兩次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. 您必須設定`StandardClick`值至`true`會引發這個事件。You must set the `StandardClick` value of to `true` for this event to be raised. > [!NOTE] > 無法針對引發下列事件類別除非至少一個中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果沒有至少一個在集合中，與使用者互動具有索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中名稱會出現)，則引發適當的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 不過，如果使用者互動是索引標籤頁面上，工作區內引發適當的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範事件處理常式中的事件。The following code example shows the event in an event handler. [!code-cpp[Control.FindForm#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.FindForm/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.FindForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.FindForm/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.FindForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.FindForm/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientRectangle As Rectangle
public: property System::Drawing::Rectangle ClientRectangle { System::Drawing::Rectangle get(); };

summary.span: 取得表示控制項工作區的矩形。

span.span: Gets the rectangle that represents the client area of the control.

value.span: 表示控制項工作區的 。

span.span: A that represents the client area of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作區是控制項的控制項，例如捲軸列、 框線、 標題列和功能表的非工作項目減去的範圍。The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus. 因為工作區座標是相對於控制項的工作區的左上角，這個屬性所傳回的矩形左上角的座標為 (0，0)。Because client coordinates are relative to the upper-left corner of the client area of the control, the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle returned by this property are (0,0). 您可以使用這個屬性取得的大小和工作，例如控制項的介面上繪製的控制項的用戶端區域的座標。You can use this property to obtain the size and coordinates of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control. 如需控制項繪製的相關資訊，請參閱[呈現 Windows Form 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md)。For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會啟用自動捲動的表單、 調整表單，並確保後調整表單大小時，維持可見 按鈕。The following code example enables auto-scrolling for a form, resizes the form, and ensures that a button remains visible after the form is resized. 這個範例需要您有與名為`button2`在其上。This example requires that you have a with a named `button2` on it. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CPP/controlmembers5.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CS/controlmembers5.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/VB/controlmembers5.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Size ClientSize { System::Drawing::Size get(); void set(System::Drawing::Size value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項工作區的高度和寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height and width of the client area of the control.

value.span: 表示控制項工作區維度的 。

span.span: A that represents the dimensions of the client area of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作區是控制項的控制項，例如捲軸列、 框線、 標題列和功能表的非工作項目減去的範圍。The client area of a control is the bounds of the control, minus the nonclient elements such as scroll bars, borders, title bars, and menus. 方法呼叫以設定屬性。The method is called to set the property. 屬性永遠不會變更透過其`set`方法，使您應該覆寫方法，以確保您的程式碼執行時屬性設定。The property is not always changed through its `set` method so you should override the method to ensure that your code is executed when the property is set. 和內容代表控制項的用戶端區域的高度與寬度。The and properties represent the width and height of the client area of the control. 您可以使用這個屬性，以取得工作區的工作，例如控制項的介面上繪製控制項的大小。You can use this property to obtain the size of the client area of the control for tasks such as drawing on the surface of the control. 如需控制項繪製的相關資訊，請參閱[呈現 Windows Form 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md)。For more information about drawing on controls, see [Rendering a Windows Forms Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-a-windows-forms-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 您無法將應用程式設定這個屬性繫結。You cannot bind application settings to this property. 如需有關應用程式設定的詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式設定概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md)。For more information on application settings, see [Application Settings Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-overview.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會調整大小指定的控制項，讓控制項可以容納其格式化的文字。The following code example resizes the specified control so the control will accommodate its formatted text. 格式化的文字是與控制項屬性的指派套用至文字。The formatted text is the property with the control's assigned applied to the text. `AutoSizeControl`方法在此範例中也有`textPadding`參數，表示要套用至控制項的所有邊緣的填補量。The `AutoSizeControl` method in this example also has a `textPadding` parameter that represents the padding to apply to all edges of the control. 若要讓出現相同的填補，以將文字的對齊值，如果您的控制項支援它。To make the padding appear equal, align the text with the value, if your control supports it. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CPP/controlmembers5.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CS/controlmembers5.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/VB/controlmembers5.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Controls As Control.ControlCollection

summary.span: 取得控制項中包含的控制項集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of controls contained within the control.

value.span: ，表示控制項中包含之控制項集合。

span.span: A representing the collection of controls contained within the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以做為控制項的集合的父系。A can act as a parent to a collection of controls. 例如，當多個控制項加入至，每個控制項所屬的指派給表單，衍生自屬性類別。For example, when several controls are added to a , each of the controls is a member of the assigned to the property of the form, which is derived from the class. 您可以使用操作中的控制項指派給屬性，方法是使用中可用的方法類別。You can manipulate the controls in the assigned to the property by using the methods available in the class. 將數個控制項加入至父控制項，建議您呼叫方法初始化加入的控制項之前。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 將控制項加入至父控制項之後, 呼叫方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 這樣會增加具有許多控制項的應用程式的效能。Doing so will increase the performance of applications with many controls. 使用來逐一查看所有控制項的表單，包括巢狀的控制項的屬性。Use the property to iterate through all controls of a form, including nested controls. 使用方法來擷取上一個或下一個子控制項定位順序中的。Use the method to retrieve the previous or next child control in the tab order. 使用屬性來取得或設定容器控制項的作用中的控制項。Use the property to get or set the active control of a container control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例移除從衍生類別的如果它是集合的成員。The following code example removes a from the of the derived class if it is a member of the collection. 這個範例需要您已建立、 ，以及至少一個上控制。The example requires that you have created a , a , and at least one control on a . 控制項加入至控制項，而控制項加入至。The control(s) are added to the control, and the control added to the . 當按一下按鈕時，選項按鈕命名為`removeButton`被移除了。When the button is clicked, the radio button named `removeButton` is removed from the . [!code-cpp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CPP/controlcollection.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/CS/controlcollection.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ControlCollection#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlCollection/VB/controlcollection.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject CreateAccessibilityInstance() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function CreateAccessibilityInstance () As AccessibleObject

summary.span: 為控制項建立新的協助工具物件。

span.span: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.

returns.span: 控制項新的 。

span.span: A new for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有明確呼叫 方法，將會在參考 屬性時呼叫該方法。If you do not explicitly call the method, it will be called when the property is referenced. > [!NOTE] > 取得或設定屬性，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`隨安裝組件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。To get or set the property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不會不含任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何覆寫方法。This code excerpt demonstrates overriding the method. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#2)]

summary.span: 強制建立可見控制項，包含建立控制代碼和任何可見的子控制項。

span.span: Forces the creation of the visible control, including the creation of the handle and any visible child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會強制控制項和其子控制項建立控制代碼。The method forces a handle to be created for the control and its child controls. 當您需要將控制代碼立即控制項或其子系; 的操作，會使用這個方法直接呼叫控制項的建構函式不會建立。This method is used when you need a handle immediately for manipulation of the control or its children; simply calling a control's constructor does not create the . 不會建立控制代碼，如果控制項的屬性是`false`。 does not create a control handle if the control's property is `false`. 您可以呼叫方法或存取屬性以建立控制項的處理不論控制項的可見性，但在此情況下，沒有任何視窗控制代碼建立控制項的子系。You can either call the method or access the property to create the control's handle regardless of the control's visibility, but in this case, no window handles are created for the control's children.

returns.span: 控制項的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件，您透過擷取方法應該不通常會保留後已處理的目前的 Windows 訊息，因為與該物件所繪製的任何項目與下一個 WM_PAINT 訊息將被清除。The object that you retrieve through the method should not normally be retained after the current Windows message has been processed, because anything painted with that object will be erased with the next WM_PAINT message. 因此您無法快取物件供重複使用，但若要使用非視覺方法，例如。Therefore you cannot cache the object for reuse, except to use non-visual methods like . 相反地，您必須呼叫每當您想要使用物件，然後再呼叫當您完成使用它。Instead, you must call every time that you want to use the object, and then call when you are finished using it. 如需 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about Windows messages, see . 根據設計，設定擁有權給呼叫執行緒，而如果它在其他執行緒上呼叫會失敗。By design, sets ownership to the calling thread, and fails if it is called on other threads. > [!NOTE] > 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 至於其他所有方法呼叫，您應該使用叫用方法的其中一個來封送處理控制項的執行緒的呼叫。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會調整大小指定的控制項，讓控制項可以容納其格式化的文字。The following code example resizes the specified control so the control will accommodate its formatted text. 格式化的文字是與控制項屬性的指派套用至文字。The formatted text is the property with the control's assigned applied to the text. `AutoSizeControl`方法在此範例中也有`textPadding`參數，表示要套用至控制項的所有邊緣的填補量。The `AutoSizeControl` method in this example also has a `textPadding` parameter that represents the padding to apply to all edges of the control. 若要讓出現相同的填補，以將文字的對齊`MiddleCenter`值如果控制項支援它。To make the padding appear equal, align the text with the `MiddleCenter` value of if your control supports it. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CPP/controlmembers5.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/CS/controlmembers5.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Member5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Member5/VB/controlmembers5.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性應該不會覆寫，用來調整衍生控制項的屬性。The property should not be overridden and used to adjust the properties of your derived control. 屬性，例如， ，和應該設定在控制項中的對應屬性例如，和。Properties such as the , , and should be set by the corresponding properties in your control such as , and . 應該只在會包裝在標準 Windows 控制項的類別或設定樣式不提供 Windows Form 的命名空間時才擴充。The should only be extended when you are wrapping a standard Windows control class or to set styles not provided by the Windows Forms namespace. 如需建立控制項參數的詳細資訊，請參閱`CreateWindow`和`CreateWindowEx`函式和[CREATESTRUCT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632603.aspx)結構文件。For more information about creating control parameters, see the `CreateWindow` and `CreateWindowEx` functions and the [CREATESTRUCT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632603.aspx)structure documentation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將擴充屬性衍生的類別。The following code example extends the property of a derived class. 屬性變更，因而導致按鈕以顯示而不是。The property is changed, which causes the button to display an rather than an . 這個範例需要您具有類別繼承自類別。This example requires that you have a class that inherits from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 指派至若要變更資料指標時，滑鼠指標位於控制項上顯示控制項的屬性。Assign a to the property of the control to change the cursor displayed when the mouse pointer is over the control. 若要暫時變更 應用程式集上的所有控制項的滑鼠游標屬性。To temporarily change the mouse cursor for all controls on your application set the property. 通常您會設定等候資料指標時填入屬性或儲存或載入檔案。Typically you would set the property to a wait cursor when populating a or saving or loading a file. 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會填入含有使用者的可用邏輯磁碟機。The following code example fills a with the user's available logical drives. 此範例也會設定下拉式方塊的屬性所以滑鼠指標停留下拉式按鈕上時，會顯示資料指標。The example also sets the combo box's property so the cursor is displayed when the mouse pointer is over the drop-down button. 此程式碼，您必須擁有與在其上。This code requires that you have a with a on it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。`Dispose()`This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method.`Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性會傳回`true`，基底類別正在處置的過程。When this property returns `true`, the base class is in the process of disposing. 已處置此控制項之後，不再做為有效的 Windows 控制項參考它。After the control is disposed of, it can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control. 即使已經處置控制項的執行個體，它仍然會保留在記憶體中直到它從透過記憶體回收的記憶體中移除。Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection. 當控制項已經處置時，無法呼叫其方法。When a control is disposed of, you cannot call its method.

summary.span: 取得或設定停駐在其父控制項的控制項框線，並決定控制項隨其父代重新調整大小的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets which control borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a control is resized with its parent.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義如何調整控制項大小的自動調整其父控制項大小時。Use the property to define how a control is automatically resized as its parent control is resized. 例如，設定至會讓控制項與父控制項的左邊緣對齊本身，並會隨著調整父控制項調整大小。For example, setting to causes the control to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized. 控制項停駐在其疊置順序，也就是表單的 z 軸 （深度） 沿著表單上控制項的視覺化圖層。Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth). 控制項可以停駐於父容器的某一邊或可停駐的邊緣和填滿的父容器。A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container. 設定停駐控制項上有任何影響的控制項與其容器邊緣的距離。Setting the property on a docked control has no effect on the distance of the control from the edges of its container. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性互斥。The and properties are mutually exclusive. 只有一個可以設定一次，最後一個設定的優先順序。Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 此範例會建立並設定其群組方塊內。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下來，設定屬性群組 方塊中，群組方塊的停駐在表單頂端。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最後，它會停用 [群組] 方塊設定屬性`false`，因而導致停用群組內包含的所有控制項。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會為事件處理常式時執行屬性值變更。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數種方法具有名稱模式*PropertyName* `Changed`所引發的時機對應*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes(*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更至如果數值為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 這個範例需要您有包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CPP/propertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CS/propertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/VB/propertychangedevents.vb#1)]

public: System::Windows::Forms::DragDropEffects DoDragDrop(System::Object ^ data, System::Windows::Forms::DragDropEffects allowedEffects);

span.span: The data to drag.
One of the values.

summary.span: 開始拖放作業。

span.span: Begins a drag-and-drop operation.

returns.span: 源自 列舉的值，表示在拖放作業時執行最後的結果。

span.span: A value from the enumeration that represents the final effect that was performed during the drag-and-drop operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `allowedEffects`參數會決定哪些作業可以發生的拖曳。The `allowedEffects` parameter determines which drag operations can occur. 在拖曳作業需要與另一個處理序中的應用程式交互操作，如果資料應是基底的 managed 的類別 (， ，或)，或該物件會實作或。If the drag operation needs to interoperate with applications in another process, data should either be a base managed class (, , or ), or an object that implements or . 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 接著會檢查此控制項是否為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控制項為有效的置放目標，指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 事件。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值的事件屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果值是`Continue`、就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置上。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 方法會攔截所有例外狀況，並重新擲回，只有下列安全性或重大例外狀況：The method catches all exceptions and rethrows only the following security or critical exceptions: - SecurityExceptionSecurityException - NullReferenceExceptionNullReferenceException - StackOverflowExceptionStackOverflowException - OutOfMemoryExceptionOutOfMemoryException - ThreadAbortExceptionThreadAbortException - ExecutionEngineExceptionExecutionEngineException - IndexOutOfRangeExceptionIndexOutOfRangeException - AccessViolationExceptionAccessViolationException ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 範例會呼叫時拖曳動作開始的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自訂的資料指標中所設定事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤的狀態會在評估右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在設`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel` . 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉來指定如何在拖放作業中所含的控制項之間傳輸資料。The following code example shows how to use the enumeration to specify how data should be transferred between the controls involved in a drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要您的表單包括控制項和控制項，控制項填入有效的檔案名稱的清單。This example requires that your form includes a control and a control and that the control is populated with a list of valid file names. 當使用者拖曳到的檔案名稱控制項，控制項的就會引發事件。When the user drags a file name onto the control, the control's event is raised. 事件處理常式內屬性會初始化為表示的檔案路徑所參照的資料應該複製到控制項。Within the event handler, the property of the is initialized to to indicate that the data referenced by the file path should be copied to the control. [!code-cpp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextDragDrop#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#1)]

Protected Overridable Property DoubleBuffered As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool DoubleBuffered { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出這個控制項是否應使用次要緩衝區重繪其介面，以減少或防止重繪閃動 (Flicker)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer to reduce or prevent flicker.

value.span: 如果應該使用雙重緩衝繪製控制項的介面，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the surface of the control should be drawn using double buffering; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已緩衝的圖形可以減少或消除閃爍漸進顯示介面的組件的重繪作業所造成。Buffered graphics can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by progressive redrawing of parts of a displayed surface. 已緩衝的圖形需要更新的圖形資料第一次寫入的緩衝區。Buffered graphics require that the updated graphics data is first written to a buffer. 圖形緩衝區中的資料會快速地寫入至顯示介面的記憶體。The data in the graphics buffer is then quickly written to displayed surface memory. 顯示的圖形記憶體的快速切換通常會減少可以發生的重繪。The relatively quick switch of the displayed graphics memory typically reduces the flicker that can otherwise occur. > [!NOTE] > 不是可繫結的屬性。 is not a bindable property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DoubleClick As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按兩下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is double-clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 使用者可以設定滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間應間隔多少時間才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下。The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click rather than two clicks. 每次按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。The event is raised every time a control is double-clicked. 比方說，如果您有事件處理常式和事件、和按兩下表單時，會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。For example, if you have event handlers for the and events of a , the and events are raised when the form is double-clicked and both methods are called. 如果按兩下控制項時，以及控制項不支援事件，事件可能會引發兩次。If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the event, the event might be raised twice. 您必須設定`StandardDoubleClick`和`StandardClick`值至`true`會引發這個事件。You must set the `StandardDoubleClick` and `StandardClick` values of to `true` for this event to be raised. 這些值可能會設定為`true`如果您繼承自現有的 Windows Form 控制項。These values might already be set to `true` if you are inheriting from existing Windows Forms controls. > [!NOTE] > 無法針對引發下列事件類別除非至少一個中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果沒有至少一個在集合中，與使用者互動具有索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中名稱會出現)，則引發適當的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 不過，如果使用者互動是索引標籤頁面上，工作區內引發適當的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件來載入文字檔案中所列到控制項。The following code example uses the event of a to load text files listed in the into a control. [!code-cpp[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.DoubleClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.DoubleClick/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於某個控制項的父控制項或表單已變更之後，以程式設計方式變更其 DPI 設定時。

span.span: Occurs when the DPI setting for a control is changed programmatically after the DPI of it's parent control or form has changed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DpiChangedBeforeParent As EventHandler

span.span: Occurs when the DPI setting for a control is changed programmatically before a DPI change event for it's parent control or form has occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragDrop As DragEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於拖放作業完成時。

span.span: Occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性會在螢幕座標中，工作區座標。The and properties of the are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates. 下的面[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]程式碼將屬性轉換為用戶端。The following line of [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] code converts the properties to a client . ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` > [!NOTE] > 在版本早於[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，如果您將與和事件在 Windows Form 上的拖曳和卸除項目拖曳至在設計階段，`DropDrop`和`DropEnter`事件引發。In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a with and events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised. 不過，當您關閉並重新開啟方案，和不會再次引發事件。However, when you close and reopen the solution, the and events are not raised again. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 請參閱完整程式碼範例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragEnter As DragEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於將物件拖曳至控制項邊框時。

span.span: Occurs when an object is dragged into the control's bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者第一次拖曳滑鼠游標移至控制項拖放作業期間，系統就會引發事件。The event is raised when the user first drags the mouse cursor over the control during a drag-and-drop operation. > [!NOTE] > 在版本早於[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，如果您將與和事件在 Windows Form 上的拖曳和卸除項目拖曳至在設計階段，`DropDrop`和`DropEnter`事件引發。In versions earlier than [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], if you put a with and events on a Windows Form and drag and drop something onto the at design time, the `DropDrop` and `DropEnter` events are raised. 不過，當您關閉並重新開啟方案，和不會再次引發事件。However, when you close and reopen the solution, the and events are not raised again. 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 接著會檢查此控制項是否為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控制項為有效的置放目標，指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 事件。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值的事件屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果值是`Continue`、就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置上。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性會在螢幕座標中，工作區座標。The and properties of the are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates. 下的面[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]程式碼將屬性轉換為用戶端。The following line of [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] code converts the properties to a client . ``` Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); ``` 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 範例會呼叫時拖曳動作開始的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自訂的資料指標中所設定事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤的狀態會在評估右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在設`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 請參閱完整程式碼範例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#7)]

以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 接著會檢查此控制項是否為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控制項為有效的置放目標，指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值的事件屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果值是`Continue`、就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置上。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 範例會呼叫時拖曳動作開始的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自訂的資料指標中所設定事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤的狀態會在評估右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在設`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 請參閱完整程式碼範例的方法。See the method for the complete code example.
