MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragOver As DragEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於將物件拖曳至控制項邊框上方時。

span.span: Occurs when an object is dragged over the control's bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠游標拖放作業期間移動控制項的範圍內時，就會引發事件。The event is raised when the mouse cursor moves within the bounds of the control during a drag-and-drop operation. 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 接著會檢查此控制項是否為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控制項為有效的置放目標，指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 事件。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值的事件屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果值值是`Continue`、就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value of value is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置上。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 和屬性會在螢幕座標中，工作區座標。The and properties of the are in screen coordinates, not client coordinates. 下列 C# 程式碼行將屬性轉換為用戶端:The following line of C# code converts the properties to a client : > > Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y));Point clientPoint = targetControl.PointToClient(new Point(de.X, de.Y)); 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 範例會呼叫時拖曳動作開始的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自訂的資料指標中所設定事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤的狀態會在評估右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在設`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 請參閱完整程式碼範例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ActiveX 控制項不支援方法。The method is not supported for ActiveX controls. 您可以覆寫事件，並視需要提供自訂的列印邏輯。You can override the event and provide custom printing logic if required. 方法具有下列限制：The method has the following limitations: - 大型點陣圖可能會擲回。An might be thrown for large bitmaps. 最大容許大小會因電腦而異。The maximum allowable size varies by machine. - 不支援`Ink`Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005 作業系統的控制項。 does not support the `Ink` controls for the Windows XP Tablet PC Edition 2005 operating system. - 不繪製子系如果屬性設`false`。 does not draw a child if the property of the is set to `false`. - 會以反向順序呈現在容器內的控制項。Controls inside containers are rendered in reverse order. - 完全正常運作的; 只繪製點陣圖的框線。 is not fully functional for the ; only the border of a bitmap is drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 與屬性，您可以啟用或停用控制項在執行階段。With the property, you can enable or disable controls at run time. 例如，您可以停用不會套用到應用程式的目前狀態的控制項。For example, you can disable controls that do not apply to the current state of the application. 您也可以停用控制項以限制其用途。You can also disable a control to restrict its use. 若要防止使用者按一下它，例如停用按鈕。For example, a button can be disabled to prevent the user from clicking it. 如果控制項已停用，無法選取。If a control is disabled, it cannot be selected. > [!IMPORTANT] > 設定屬性`false`不會停用應用程式的控制項方塊或防止應用程式視窗接收焦點。Setting the property to `false` does not disable the application's control box or prevent the application window from receiving the focus. 當容器控制項具有其已啟用的屬性設定為`false`，其包含的控制項已停用，以及。When a container control has its enabled property set to `false`, all its contained controls are disabled, as well. 例如，如果使用者在任何已停用所包含的控制項控制項，不會引發事件。For example, if the user clicks on any of the controls contained in a disabled control, no events are raised. > [!NOTE] > 停用可捲動的控制項時，捲軸也會停用。When a scrollable control is disabled, the scroll bars are also disabled. 例如，已停用的多行文字方塊是無法捲動，以顯示文字的所有行。For example, a disabled multiline textbox is unable to scroll to display all the lines of text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 此範例會建立並設定其群組方塊內。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下來，設定屬性群組 方塊中，群組方塊的停駐在表單頂端。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最後，它會停用 [群組] 方塊設定屬性`false`，因而導致停用群組內包含的所有控制項。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尚未完成非同步作業，此函式會封鎖，直到得到結果為止。If the asynchronous operation has not been completed, this function will block until the result is available. > [!NOTE] > 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 至於其他所有方法呼叫，您應該使用叫用方法的其中一個來封送處理控制項的執行緒的呼叫。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您藉由呼叫中使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等） 變更焦點時或方法，或藉由設定屬性目前的表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`、和事件都會被隱藏。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 和事件隱藏的類別。The and events are suppressed by the class. 中的對等事件類別和事件。The equivalent events in the class are the and events. 和事件階層，直到達到適當的控制項，向上和向下的父鏈結會串聯。The and events are hierarchical and will cascade up and down the parent chain until the appropriate control is reached. 例如，假設您有具有兩個控制項，以及每個控制項有一個控制項。For example, assume you have a with two controls, and each control has one control. 當插入號移從其中一個，都會引發事件和，而引發其他和。When the caret is moved from one to the other, the event is raised for the and , and the event is raised for the other and . > [!CAUTION] > 請勿嘗試將焦點設在， ， ， ， ，或事件處理常式。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 如此一來，可能會導致您的應用程式或作業系統停止回應。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`WM_KILLFOCUS`< 鍵盤輸入參考 > 一節的 「 訊息死結 」 一節中的主題[有關訊息和訊息佇列](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the `WM_KILLFOCUS` topic in the "Keyboard Input Reference" section and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the[About Messages and Message Queues](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topic. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件來變更前景和背景的色彩在特定情況下。The following code example uses the event to change the foreground and background colors of a under particular conditions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回`true`如果控制項已成功收到輸入的焦點。The method returns `true` if the control successfully received input focus. 控制項可以有輸入的焦點，但不顯示擁有焦點的任何視覺提示。The control can have the input focus while not displaying any visual cues of having the focus. 下面列出的不可選取控制項主要是觀察此行為，或任何控制項衍生自它們。This behavior is primarily observed by the nonselectable controls listed below, or any controls derived from them. 控制項可以選取和接收輸入的焦點，如果下列所有條件都成立：`Selectable`值設`true`、 它包含在另一個控制項和所有其父控制項都是可見並已啟用。A control can be selected and receive input focus if all the following are true: the `Selectable` value of is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 下列清單中的 Windows Form 控制項不能選取。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 衍生自這些控制項的控制項不能也選取。Controls derived from these controls are also not selectable. - - - - - - - （如果沒有在控制項中顯示連結） (when there is no link present in the control) > [!NOTE] > 低層級的方法主要被供自訂控制項作者。 is a low-level method intended primarily for custom control authors. 應用程式設計人員應該改用方法或子控制項的屬性或表單的方法。Instead, application programmers should use the method or the property for child controls, or the method for forms. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將焦點設定為指定，如果它能夠接收焦點。The following code example sets focus to the specified , if it can receive focus. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 因為是不可變的 （表示您不能調整的任何屬性），您只能指派新屬性。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new . 不過，您可以根據現有的字型為新字型。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. [Visual Basic、 C#][Visual Basic, C#] 如何調整現有的字型，讓它變成粗體的範例如下：The following is an example of how to adjust the existing font to make it bold: ```csharp myControl.Font = new Font(myControl.Font, myControl.Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb MyControl.Font = New Font(MyControl.Font, _ MyControl.Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示給使用者，並變更的控制項。The following code example displays a to the user and changes the of a control. 這個範例需要您有與和在其上。This example requires that you have a with and a on it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是 helper 方法，由呼叫擷取縮放控制項的界限。This is a helper method that is called by to retrieve the bounds within which the control is scaled. 您可以覆寫這個方法，以重複使用縮放邏輯，但您必須提供您自己的界限。You can override this method to reuse the scaling logic, but you must supply your own bounds. 預設實作會傳回縮放的範圍考量`specified`中繫結，控制項是否為最上層，是否控制項固定寬度或自動調整大小的控制項可能會有任何裝飾。The default implementation returns scaled bounds that take into account the `specified` bounds, whether the control is top level, whether the control is fixed width or auto size, and any adornments the control might have.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GiveFeedback As GiveFeedbackEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於拖曳作業時。

span.span: Occurs during a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放作業開始時，就會引發事件。The event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 與事件的拖曳事件來源可以修改滑鼠指標外觀才能將使用者視覺化回應提供拖放作業期間。With the event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 接著會檢查此控制項是否為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控制項為有效的置放目標，指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 事件。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值的事件屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果值是`Continue`、就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置上。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 範例會呼叫時拖曳動作開始的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。The example requires that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自訂的資料指標中所設定事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤的狀態會在評估右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在設`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 請參閱完整程式碼範例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GotFocus As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於控制項取得焦點時。

span.span: Occurs when the control receives focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您藉由呼叫中使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等） 變更焦點時或方法，或藉由設定屬性目前的表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`、和事件都會被隱藏。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. **請注意**和事件是低階的焦點事件會繫結至 WM_KILLFOCUS 和 WM_SETFOCUS Windows 訊息。**Note** The and events are low-level focus events that are tied to the WM_KILLFOCUS and WM_SETFOCUS Windows messages. 一般而言，和更新時，才會使用事件或撰寫自訂控制項時。Typically, the and events are only used when updating or when writing custom controls. 改為和事件應該可用於所有的控制項，除了類別，它會使用和事件。Instead the and events should be used for all controls except the class, which uses the and events. 如需有關和事件，請參閱[WM_SETFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646283\(v=vs.85\).aspx)和[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information about the and events, see the [WM_SETFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646283\(v=vs.85\).aspx)and[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topics. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿嘗試將焦點設在， ， ， ， ，或事件處理常式。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 如此一來，可能會導致您的應用程式或作業系統停止回應。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制代碼時，會建立顯示第一次。A handle is created when the is displayed for the first time. 比方說，如果會建立具有設`false`、事件將不會引發設`true`。For example, if a is created that has set to `false`, the event will not be raised until is set to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see[Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 取得指示控制項是否包含一或多個子控制項的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the control contains one or more child controls.

value.span: 如果控制項包含一或多個子控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the control contains one or more child controls; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合具有小於或等於零，屬性會傳回`true`。If the collection has a greater than zero, the property will return `true`. 存取屬性不會強制建立如果控制項有沒有子系，因此參考這個屬性可提供效能優勢時查核樹狀結構的控制項。Accessing the property does not force the creation of a if the control has no children, so referencing this property can provide a performance benefit when walking a tree of controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定和預設系統色彩的控制項。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控制項的任何子控制項，則程式碼以遞迴方式呼叫其本身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 這個程式碼範例需要您具有與至少一個子系控制項; 不過，子容器控制，例如或，使用自己的子系控制項會進一步示範遞迴。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the control.

value.span: 控制項的高度 (單位為像素)。

span.span: The height of the control in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所做的變更和屬性值會使變更控制項的屬性值。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the control to change. > [!NOTE] > 衍生的控制項的最小高度是一個像素。The minimum height for the derived control is one pixel. 預設高度控制項是三個像素為單位。The default height for the control is three pixels. 設定的高度控制的值小於一將值重設屬性的預設高度。Setting the height of the control to a value less than one will reset the property value to the default height. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立三個表單上的控制項，並將其大小和位置設定使用的各種大小與和位置相關的屬性。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 這個範例需要您有有寬度和高度的最少 300 像素為單位。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CPP/controlsizelocation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CS/controlsizelocation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/VB/controlsizelocation.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event HelpRequested As HelpEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者要求控制項的說明時。

span.span: Occurs when the user requests help for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者按下 F1 時，通常就會引發事件索引鍵或相關聯的即時線上說明 按鈕已按下。The event is commonly raised when the user presses the F1 key or an associated context-sensitive help button is clicked. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範處理事件，以包含四個地址欄位的表單上顯示自訂的說明內容。The following code example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位中，或使用 [即時線上說明] 按鈕，按一下 [位址] 欄位說明資料指標，就會引發事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 屬性設定為 true，表示`HelpRequested`處理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 此範例也示範儲存中的說明文字屬性。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]

summary.span: 對使用者隱藏控制項。

span.span: Conceals the control from the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 隱藏控制項相當於設定屬性`false`。Hiding the control is equivalent to setting the property to `false`. 之後呼叫方法時，屬性會傳回值為`false`直到方法呼叫。After the method is called, the property returns a value of `false` until the method is called. ## Examples 當按鈕按下 CTRL 鍵時，下列程式碼範例會隱藏按鈕。The following code example hides a button if the CTRL key is pressed when the button is clicked. 這個範例需要您有名為`button1`上。This example requires that you have a named `button1` on a . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CPP/controlmembers4.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CS/controlmembers4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/VB/controlmembers4.vb#2)]

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的輸入法 (IME) 模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the Input Method Editor (IME) mode of the control.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks IME 是一種程式，可讓使用者輸入複雜字元和符號，例如日文漢字字元，使用標準鍵盤。An IME is a program that enables users to enter complex characters and symbols, such as Japanese Kanji characters, using a standard keyboard. 屬性通常會設定為如旨在只有輸入數字值的控制項。The property is typically set to for a control that is intended to only enter numeric values. 屬性值設定為如類別。The property value is set to for the class. 大部分的類別不直接支援輸入法編輯器，或允許從 IME，直接輸入將會設定這個屬性的值。Most classes that do not directly support Input Method Editors, or allow direct input from an IME, will set the value of this property to . > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用者可以互動方式變更除非它已透過程式設計方式設定為。The user can interactively change the unless it has been programmatically set to . 在此情況下，使用者將無法使用輸入法。In this case, the user will not be able to use the IME. > > 全域的輸入的模式作用時，將會忽略在 Windows 8 上的屬性。The property is ignored on Windows 8 when the global input mode is in effect. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[交換器文字輸入從變更每個執行緒為每個使用者](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509)。For more info, see[Switch Text Input Changed from Per-Thread to Per-User](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=256509).

exception.span: 所指派的值不是其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: The assigned value is not one of the enumeration values.

summary.span: 發生於 屬性變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件屬性變更時以程式設計方式修改或透過互動。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or through interaction. 控制項不支援輸入法管理員一定不會引發這個事件。Controls that do not support Input Method Managers will never raise this event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會為事件處理常式時執行屬性值變更。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數種方法具有名稱模式*PropertyName* `Changed`所引發的時機對應*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更至如果數值為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 這個範例需要您有包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CPP/propertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/CS/propertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_PropertyChangedEvents/VB/propertychangedevents.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitLayout() cil managed

summary.span: 在控制項加入其他容器後呼叫。

span.span: Called after the control has been added to another container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將控制項加入至容器之後，立即呼叫方法。The method is called immediately after adding a control to a container. 方法可讓初始化其配置狀態，根據其容器的控制項。The method enables a control to initialize its layout state based on its container. 例如，您通常套用錨定和停駐到中的控制項方法。For example, you would typically apply anchoring and docking to the control in the method.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，以便正確顯示控制項。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is displayed correctly.

summary.span: 使控制項的特定區域失效，並且造成傳送繪製訊息至控制項。

span.span: Invalidates a specific region of the control and causes a paint message to be sent to the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Invalidate() cil managed

summary.span: 讓控制項的整個介面失效，並重新繪製控制項。

span.span: Invalidates the entire surface of the control and causes the control to be redrawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法不會強制同步小畫家; 若要強制同步小畫家，請呼叫方法之後呼叫方法。Calling the method does not force a synchronous paint; to force a synchronous paint, call the method after calling the method. 呼叫這個方法時，不含任何參數，將整個用戶端區域加入到更新區域中。When this method is called with no parameters, the entire client area is added to the update region. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會啟用卸除使用者將是影像或影像檔案拖曳至表單，並將其顯示在其上的點。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 表單繪製每次重新繪製影像會覆寫方法; 否則為映像就只會一直保存到下一步 重新繪製。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件處理方法判斷被拖曳至表單的資料類型，並提供適當的回應。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件處理方法會顯示在表單中，影像如果可以從資料建立。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因為和值螢幕座標，這個範例會使用方法，將它們轉換為用戶端座標。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CPP/imagedrag.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/CS/imagedrag.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control.DragOperations/VB/imagedrag.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於控制項的顯示需要重新繪製時。

span.span: Occurs when a control's display requires redrawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#40)]

summary.span: 在擁有控制項基礎視窗控制代碼的執行緒上執行委派。

span.span: Executes a delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object Invoke(class System.Delegate method) cil managed
Public Function Invoke (method As Delegate) As Object

param.name: method
param.span: 委派，包含要在控制項執行緒內容中呼叫的方法。

span.span: A delegate that contains a method to be called in the control's thread context.

summary.span: 在擁有控制項基礎視窗控制代碼的執行緒上執行指定的委派。

span.span: Executes the specified delegate on the thread that owns the control's underlying window handle.

returns.span: 來自所叫用的委派的傳回值，或者如果委派沒有任何傳回值，則為 。

span.span: The return value from the delegate being invoked, or if the delegate has no return value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派是與 C 或 c + + 語言的函式指標類似。Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages. 委派會封裝將委派物件內的方法參考。Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object. 然後可以委派物件傳遞至程式碼呼叫受參考的方法，並在編譯時期，要叫用的方法可以是未知。The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time. 不同於在 C 或 c + + 中的函式指標，委派為物件導向、 類型安全且更安全。Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure. 如果尚不存在目前的控制項基礎視窗控制代碼，請處理方法會搜尋直到找到的控制項或表單，視窗控制項的父鏈結。The method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that has a window handle if the current control's underlying window handle does not exist yet. 如果找不到適當的控制代碼，方法會擲回例外狀況。If no appropriate handle can be found, the method will throw an exception. 在呼叫期間引發的例外狀況會傳播回到呼叫端。Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 至於其他所有方法呼叫，您應該使用叫用方法的其中一個來封送處理控制項的執行緒的呼叫。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 委派可以是的執行個體，在此情況下寄件者參數會包含此控制項，且事件參數會包含。The delegate can be an instance of , in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain . 委派也可以是的執行個體，或任何其他接受 void 參數清單的委派。The delegate can also be an instance of , or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list. 呼叫或委派將會比其他類型的委派呼叫更快。A call to an or delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate. > [!NOTE] > 如果應該處理訊息的執行緒不再為作用中，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示包含委派的控制項。The following code example shows controls that contain a delegate. 委派會封裝將項目加入至清單方塊中，並擁有表單的基礎控制代碼的執行緒上執行此方法。The delegate encapsulates a method that adds items to the list box, and this method is executed on the thread that owns the underlying handle of the form. 當使用者按一下按鈕，`Invoke`執行委派。When the user clicks on the button, `Invoke` runs the delegate. remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派是與 C 或 c + + 語言的函式指標類似。Delegates are similar to function pointers in C or C++ languages. 委派會封裝將委派物件內的方法參考。Delegates encapsulate a reference to a method inside a delegate object. 然後可以委派物件傳遞至程式碼呼叫受參考的方法，並在編譯時期，要叫用的方法可以是未知。The delegate object can then be passed to code that calls the referenced method, and the method to be invoked can be unknown at compile time. 不同於在 C 或 c + + 中的函式指標，委派為物件導向、 類型安全且更安全。Unlike function pointers in C or C++, delegates are object-oriented, type-safe, and more secure. 如果尚不存在的控制項控點，直到找到的控制項或表單沒有視窗控制代碼，這個方法會搜尋控制項的父鏈結。If the control's handle does not exist yet, this method searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到適當的控制代碼，這個方法會擲回例外狀況。If no appropriate handle can be found, this method throws an exception. 在呼叫期間引發的例外狀況會傳播回到呼叫端。Exceptions that are raised during the call will be propagated back to the caller. > [!NOTE] > 除了屬性，在控制項上都是安全執行緒的四種方法： ， ， ，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe: , , , and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 至於其他所有方法呼叫，您應該使用叫用方法的其中一個來封送處理控制項的執行緒的呼叫。For all other method calls, you should use one of the invoke methods to marshal the call to the control's thread. 委派可以是的執行個體，在此情況下寄件者參數會包含此控制項，且事件參數會包含。The delegate can be an instance of , in which case the sender parameter will contain this control, and the event parameter will contain . 委派也可以是的執行個體，或任何其他接受 void 參數清單的委派。The delegate can also be an instance of , or any other delegate that takes a void parameter list. 呼叫或委派將會比其他類型的委派呼叫更快。A call to an or delegate will be faster than a call to another type of delegate. > [!NOTE] > 如果應該處理訊息的執行緒不再為作用中，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示包含委派的控制項。The following code example shows controls that contain a delegate. 委派會封裝將項目加入至清單方塊中，並擁有表單，並使用指定的引數的基礎控制代碼的執行緒上執行此方法。The delegate encapsulates a method that adds items to the list box, and this method is executed on the thread that owns the underlying handle of the form, using the specified arguments. 當使用者按一下按鈕，`Invoke`執行委派。When the user clicks on the button, `Invoke` runs the delegate. [!code-cpp[Control_Invoke1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke1/CPP/control_invoke1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control_Invoke1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke1/CS/control_invoke1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_Invoke1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_Invoke1/VB/control_invoke1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InvokeRequired As Boolean
public: property bool InvokeRequired { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得一個值。這個值會指示是否由於呼叫端是在建立控制項之執行緒以外的執行緒，因此在進行控制項的方法呼叫時，應呼叫叫用 (Invoke) 方法。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the caller must call an invoke method when making method calls to the control because the caller is on a different thread than the one the control was created on.

value.span: 如果控制項的 是在呼叫執行緒以外的執行緒上建立，則為 (表示必須透過叫用方法呼叫)，否則為 。

span.span: if the control's was created on a different thread than the calling thread (indicating that you must make calls to the control through an invoke method); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Form 控制項繫結至特定的執行緒，並不具備執行緒安全。Controls in Windows Forms are bound to a specific thread and are not thread safe. 如果您從不同的執行緒呼叫控制項的方法，您必須使用控制項的叫用封送處理至適當的執行緒呼叫的方法。Therefore, if you are calling a control's method from a different thread, you must use one of the control's invoke methods to marshal the call to the proper thread. 這個屬性可以用來判斷是否您必須呼叫叫用方法，如果您不知道哪個執行緒擁有控制項就很有用。This property can be used to determine if you must call an invoke method, which can be useful if you do not know what thread owns a control. > [!NOTE] > 除了屬性，在控制項上四種具備執行緒安全呼叫的方法： ，，和如果已經建立控制項的控制代碼。In addition to the property, there are four methods on a control that are thread safe to call: ,, and if the handle for the control has already been created. 呼叫背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼之前可能會導致不合法的跨執行緒呼叫。Calling before the control's handle has been created on a background thread can cause illegal cross thread calls. 至於其他所有方法呼叫中，您應該使用下列其中一種從不同的執行緒呼叫時，叫用方法。For all other method calls, you should use one of these invoke methods when calling from a different thread. 如果尚未存在的控制代碼，搜尋上控制項的父鏈結，直到它找到的控制項或表單沒有視窗控制代碼。If the control's handle does not yet exist, searches up the control's parent chain until it finds a control or form that does have a window handle. 如果找不到適當的控制代碼，方法會傳回`false`。If no appropriate handle can be found, the method returns `false`. 這表示可以傳回`false`如果就不需要 （呼叫，就會發生在相同執行緒上），或是不同的執行緒上建立控制項，但是尚未建立控制項的控制代碼。This means that can return `false` if is not required (the call occurs on the same thread), or if the control was created on a different thread but the control's handle has not yet been created. 尚未建立控制項的控制代碼的情況下，您不應該直接呼叫屬性、 方法或事件在控制項上。In the case where the control's handle has not yet been created, you should not simply call properties, methods, or events on the control. 這可能會造成隔離沒有訊息幫浦的執行緒上的控制項，並讓此應用程式不穩定的背景執行緒上建立控制項的控制代碼。This might cause the control's handle to be created on the background thread, isolating the control on a thread without a message pump and making the application unstable. 您可以保護針對此案例也檢查值時傳回`false`背景執行緒上。You can protect against this case by also checking the value of when returns `false` on a background thread. 如果尚未建立控制代碼，您必須等到它建立之後，再呼叫或。If the control handle has not yet been created, you must wait until it has been created before calling or . 通常，這是背景執行緒會在應用程式的主要表單的建構函式時，才 (像是`Application.Run(new MainForm())`，才能在顯示表單或`Application.Run`已呼叫。Typically, this happens only if a background thread is created in the constructor of the primary form for the application (as in `Application.Run(new MainForm())`, before the form has been shown or `Application.Run` has been called. 一個解決方案是等到之前啟動的背景執行緒已建立表單的控點。One solution is to wait until the form's handle has been created before starting the background thread. 請藉由呼叫強制控制代碼建立屬性或等候啟動背景處理序的事件。Either force handle creation by calling the property, or wait until the event to start the background process. 更好的解決方案是使用`SynchronizationContext`傳回而不是封送處理跨執行緒的控制項。An even better solution is to use the `SynchronizationContext` returned by rather than a control for cross-thread marshaling. > [!NOTE] > 如果應該處理訊息的執行緒不再為作用中，可能會擲回例外狀況。An exception might be thrown if the thread that should process the message is no longer active. 如需多執行緒 Windows Form 控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用背景執行緒搜尋檔案](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-use-a-background-thread-to-search-for-files.md)和[How to： 至 Windows Form 控制項進行安全執行緒呼叫](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md)。For more information about multithreaded Windows Forms controls, see [How to: Use a Background Thread to Search for Files](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-use-a-background-thread-to-search-for-files.md) and [How to: Make Thread-Safe Calls to Windows Forms Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-make-thread-safe-calls-to-windows-forms-controls.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性會傳回`true`，控制會處置與不再可以參考做為有效的 Windows 控制項。When this property returns `true`, the control is disposed of and can no longer be referenced as a valid Windows control. 即使已經處置控制項的執行個體，它仍然會保留在記憶體中直到它從透過記憶體回收的記憶體中移除。Even though the instance of a control is disposed of, it is still maintained in memory until it is removed from memory through garbage collection. 處置控制項時，您不能呼叫它方法。When a control is disposed, you cannot call its method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否已呼叫。Use the property to determine whether has been called.

span.span: if the character should be sent directly to the control and not preprocessed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法來判斷所指定的字元是否`charCode`參數是控制項要輸入的字元。Call the method to determine whether the character specified by the `charCode` parameter is an input character that the control wants. 在視窗訊息來判斷指定的輸入的字元是否應該前置處理過或直接傳送至控制項前置處理期間呼叫這個方法。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control. 如果傳回`true`，指定的字元會直接傳送給控制項。If returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the control. 如果傳回`false`，前置處理指定的字元，如果它不由前置處理階段只傳送給控制項。If returns `false`, the specified character is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 前置處理的字元包括檢查的字元是否另一個控制項的助憶鍵。The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以判斷是否由指定的索引鍵`keyData`參數是控制項要輸入索引鍵。Call the method to determine whether the key specified by the `keyData` parameter is an input key that the control wants. 在視窗訊息來判斷是否應該前置處理過或直接傳送至控制項的指定輸入的索引鍵前置處理期間呼叫這個方法。This method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the specified input key should be preprocessed or sent directly to the control. 如果傳回`true`，指定索引鍵會直接傳送給控制項。If returns `true`, the specified key is sent directly to the control. 如果傳回`false`，前置處理指定的金鑰，並只傳送至控制項，如果它不由前置處理階段。If returns `false`, the specified key is preprocessed and only sent to the control if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase. 前置處理過的索引鍵包括 [] 索引標籤，傳回、 esc 鍵和向上、 向下鍵、 向左鍵和向右箭號的索引鍵。Keys that are preprocessed include the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and the UP ARROW, DOWN ARROW, LEFT ARROW, and RIGHT ARROW keys. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何覆寫方法控制項。The following code example shows you how to override the method for a control. 在此範例中，`TabTextBox`類別處理 TAB 鍵。In this example, the `TabTextBox` class handles the TAB key. 當`TabTextBox`擁有焦點且使用者按下 TAB 鍵在文字插入點，加入四個空格取代任何選取的文字。When the `TabTextBox` has the focus and the user presses the TAB key four spaces are added at the text insertion point, replacing any selected text. 根據預設，控制處理 TAB 鍵將輸入的焦點移至下一個控制項。By default, the control handles the TAB key by moving the input focus to the next control. 在此情況下，keypress 永遠不會到達方法覆寫。In this case, the keypress never reaches the method override. 若要防止這個預設行為，方法覆寫會傳回`true`當使用者按下 TAB 鍵。To prevent this default behavior, the method override returns `true` when the user presses the TAB key. 針對所有其他的按鍵方法覆寫會傳回呼叫方法的基底類別版本的結果。For all other keypresses, the method override returns the result of calling the base-class version of the method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey/cs/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey/vb/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 發生於按下按鍵且焦點在控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed while the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鍵事件會依下列順序發生：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用接收鍵盤事件的其他控制項，將屬性在表單的事件處理方法來`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 是自動由控制項處理特定按鍵，例如索引標籤、 RETURN、 esc 鍵和箭號。Certain keys, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys are handled by controls automatically. 若要將會引發這些機碼事件，必須覆寫表單上的每個控制項中的方法。To have these keys raise the event, you must override the method in each control on your form. 覆寫的程式碼就必須判斷其中一個特殊的金鑰按下，傳回的值`true`。The code for the override of the would need to determine if one of the special keys is pressed and return a value of `true`. 而不是覆寫方法，您可以處理事件以及組屬性`true`。Instead of overriding the method, you can handle the event and set the property to `true`. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱事件。For a code example, see the event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件，以判斷輸入控制項的字元類型。The following code example uses the event to determine the type of character entered into the control. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鍵事件會依下列順序發生：Key events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 空間和退格鍵以外的非字元按鍵不引發事件; 不過，並引發非字元按鍵和事件。The event is not raised by non-character keys other than space and backspace; however, the non-character keys do raise the and events. 使用屬性範例按鍵輸入，在執行階段，並且將會使用或修改一般按鍵的子集。Use the property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes. 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用接收鍵盤事件的其他控制項，將屬性在表單的事件處理方法來`true`。To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable other controls to receive keyboard events, set the property in your form's event-handling method to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用防止字元輸入這個控制項的事件。The following code example uses the event to prevent characters from entering the control. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Layout As LayoutEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於控制項應重新調整其子控制項位置時。

span.span: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子控制項所新增或移除，當控制項變更，以及其他可能變更的範圍可能會影響控制項的配置時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control. 配置事件可以使用，以歸併和方法。The layout event can be suppressed using the and methods. 暫止配置可讓您在控制項上執行多個動作，而不需要執行的每個變更的配置。Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change. 例如，如果您調整大小並移動控制項，每一項作業將會引發事件。For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是為主在螢幕上事件。The following code example centers a on the screen in the event. 如此可保留置中隨著使用者調整它的格式。This will keep the form centered as the user resizes it. 這個範例需要您已建立控制項。This example requires that you have created a control. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Leave As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於輸入焦點離開控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您藉由呼叫中使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等） 變更焦點時或方法，或藉由設定屬性目前的表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`、和事件都會被隱藏。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 和事件隱藏的類別。The and events are suppressed by the class. 中的對等事件類別和事件。The equivalent events in the class are the and events. 和事件階層，直到達到適當的控制項，向上和向下的父鏈結會串聯。The and events are hierarchical and will cascade up and down the parent chain until the appropriate control is reached. 例如，假設您有具有兩個控制項，以及每個控制項有一個控制項。For example, assume you have a with two controls, and each control has one control. 當插入號移從其中一個，都會引發事件和，而引發其他和。When the caret is moved from one to the other, the event is raised for the and , and the event is raised for the other and . > [!CAUTION] > 請勿嘗試將焦點設在， ， ， ， ，或事件處理常式。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 如此一來，可能會導致您的應用程式或作業系統停止回應。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用其先前的狀態重設控制項的事件。The following code example uses the event to reset a control to its former state. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是實值類型 (`Structure`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，`struct`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)])，它會傳回值，表示存取屬性會傳回控制項的左上角點的複本。Because the class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the upper-left point of the control. 因此，調整或屬性傳回從這個屬性將不會影響， ， ，或控制項的屬性值。So, adjusting the or properties of the returned from this property will not affect the , , , or property values of the control. 若要調整這些屬性會個別設定每個屬性值，或設定屬性與新。To adjust these properties set each property value individually, or set the property with a new . 如果是、屬性值表示的左上角螢幕座標中。If the is a , the property value represents the upper-left corner of the in screen coordinates. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 此範例會建立並設定其群組方塊內。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下來，設定屬性群組 方塊中，群組方塊的停駐在表單頂端。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最後，它會停用 [群組] 方塊設定屬性`false`，因而導致停用群組內包含的所有控制項。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`、和事件都會被隱藏。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果屬性設`true`中事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件事件都會被隱藏。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. > [!NOTE] > 和事件是低階的焦點事件會繫結至 WM_KILLFOCUS 和 WM_SETFOCUS Windows 訊息。The and events are low-level focus events that are tied to the WM_KILLFOCUS and WM_SETFOCUS Windows messages. 一般而言，和更新時，才會使用事件或撰寫自訂控制項時。Typically, the and events are only used when updating or when writing custom controls. 改為和事件應該可用於所有的控制項，除了類別，它會使用和事件。Instead the and events should be used for all controls except the class, which uses the and events. 如需有關和事件，請參閱[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)和[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information about the and events, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) and [WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topics. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿嘗試將焦點設在， ， ， ， ，或事件處理常式。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 如此一來，可能會導致您的應用程式或作業系統停止回應。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the [WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms646282\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何驗證 TextBox1 文字。The following code example demonstrates validating the text for TextBox1. 它也會示範處理藉由設定事件TextBox1 中文字的屬性。It also demonstrates handling the event by setting the property to the text in TextBox1. 使用的程式碼範例方法來檢查錯誤，然後再開啟 MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseCaptureChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於控制項遺失滑鼠捕捉時。

span.span: Occurs when the control loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在罕見的情況下，您可能需要在偵測到未預期的輸入。In rare scenarios, you might need to detect unexpected input. 例如，請考慮下列案例。For example, consider the following scenarios. - 在滑鼠作業時，使用者會開啟 [開始] 功能表，請按 Windows 鍵或 CTRL + esc 鍵。During a mouse operation, the user opens the Start menu by pressing the Windows key or CTRL+ESC. - 在滑鼠作業時，使用者會切換成另一個程式按 ALT + TAB。During a mouse operation, the user switches to another program by pressing ALT+TAB. - 滑鼠作業時，另一個程式會顯示在視窗或接受焦點從目前的應用程式的訊息方塊。During a mouse operation, another program displays a window or a message box that takes focus away from the current application. 滑鼠的作業可能包括按一下並按住滑鼠按一下表單或控制項，或執行滑鼠拖曳作業。Mouse operations can include clicking and holding the mouse on a form or a control, or performing a mouse drag operation. 如果您有可偵測當表單或控制項失去滑鼠捕捉這些及相關的非預期情況下，您可以使用事件。If you have to detect when a form or a control loses mouse capture for these and related unexpected scenarios, you can use the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範事件控制項。The following code example demonstrates the event for a control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.mousecapturechanged/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseCaptureChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.mousecapturechanged/vb/form1.vb#1)] 若要測試此範例中，它在偵錯工具中按 f5 鍵執行。To test this example, run it in the debugger by pressing F5. 開啟**輸出**Visual Studio 中的視窗，讓您可以查看當引發事件。Open the **Output** window in Visual Studio so that you can see when events are raised. 按一下，並注意下列輸出。Click the and notice the following output. `button1_MouseDown` `button1_MouseUp` `button1_MouseCaptureChanged` 現在，按住滑鼠左鍵控制項。Now, click and hold the left mouse button on the control. 同時仍按一下滑鼠，請按 ALT + TAB，切換到另一個程式。While still clicking the mouse, press ALT+TAB to switch to another program. 請注意，就會引發事件，讓您可能會解決這種情況。Notice that the event is raised enabling you to potentially handle this scenario. 根據您的動作，可能不會引發事件。Depending on your actions, the event might not be raised. 您也可以嘗試這項測試的 Windows 鍵或 CTRL + esc 鍵。You can also try this test with the Windows key or CTRL+ESC. `button1_MouseDown` `button1_MouseCaptureChanged`

summary.span: 發生於以滑鼠按一下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當資料指標通常是在控制項上按滑鼠按鈕時，會引發一系列如下的控制項的事件：Depressing a mouse button when the cursor is over a control typically raises the following series of events from the control: 1. 事件。 event. 2. 事件。 event. 3. 事件。 event. 4. 事件。 event. 要執行此，就無法停用各種事件中控制項的類別。For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class. 兩個單一發生關閉足夠的時間，取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定將產生的點選事件，而不是第二個事件。Two single clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate a event instead of the second event. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件是控制項的以邏輯方式較高層級事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它們通常會引發受到其他動作，例如，當控制項取得焦點時按下 ENTER 鍵。They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 發生於以滑鼠按兩下控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the control is double clicked by the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時使用者按下滑鼠按鈕中快速且連續兩次，資料指標位於控制項上時，就會發生事件。The event occurs when the user depresses a mouse button twice in quick succession when the cursor is over the control. 按兩下分隔兩個單一按鍵的時間間隔取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定。The time interval that separates two single clicks from a double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system. 控制項就會發生這類使用者動作時，即會引發下列一系列的事件：The following series of events is raised by the control when such a user action takes place: 1. 事件。 event. 2. 事件。 event. 3. 事件。 event. 4. 事件。 event. 5. 事件。 event. 6. 事件。 event. 7. 事件。 event. 8. 事件。 event. 要執行此，就無法停用各種事件中控制項的類別。For this to occur, the various events cannot be disabled in the control's class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 事件是控制項的以邏輯方式較高層級事件。 events are logically higher-level events of a control. 它們可能會由其他使用者動作，例如快速鍵組合所引發。They may be raised by other user actions, such as shortcut key combinations. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#55)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#55)]

summary.span: 發生於滑鼠指標位於控制項上，並且按下滑鼠按鍵時。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer is over the control and a mouse button is pressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 無法針對引發下列事件類別除非至少一個中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果沒有至少一個在集合中，與使用者互動具有索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中名稱會出現)，則引發適當的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 不過，如果使用者互動是索引標籤頁面上，工作區內引發適當的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製的路徑滑鼠。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 直線線段加入每個和所發生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新圖形，方法針對呼叫每`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，圖形的路徑會捲動向上或向下時就會發生事件。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他的滑鼠事件，例如，以及螢幕上所識別。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊類別。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CPP/mouseeventexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/CS/mouseeventexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MouseEvent/VB/mouseeventexample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 發生於滑鼠指標進入控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 無法針對引發下列事件類別除非至少一個中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果沒有至少一個在集合中，與使用者互動具有索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中名稱會出現)，則引發適當的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 不過，如果使用者互動是索引標籤頁面上，工作區內引發適當的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製的路徑滑鼠。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 直線線段加入每個和所發生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新圖形，方法針對呼叫每`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，圖形的路徑會捲動向上或向下時就會發生事件。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他的滑鼠事件，例如，以及螢幕上所識別。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊類別。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. summary.span: 發生於滑鼠指標停留在控制項上時。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型用法是當滑鼠停留 （「 停留矩形內，"） 的控制項周圍的指定區域內的控制項上時顯示工具提示。A typical use of is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle"). 以毫秒為單位的指定會引發這個事件所需的暫停屬性。The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the property. 事件定義，且與偵測到和屬性。The event is defined and detected in connection with the and properties. 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. > [!NOTE] > 無法針對引發下列事件類別除非至少一個中集合： ， ， ， ， ， ，和。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果沒有至少一個在集合中，與使用者互動具有索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中名稱會出現)，則引發適當的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 不過，如果使用者互動是索引標籤頁面上，工作區內引發適當的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the client area of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製的路徑滑鼠。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 直線線段加入每個和所發生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新圖形，方法針對呼叫每`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，圖形的路徑會捲動向上或向下時就會發生事件。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他的滑鼠事件，例如，以及螢幕上所識別。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊類別。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. public: static property System::Drawing::Point MousePosition { System::Drawing::Point get(); };

summary.span: 取得滑鼠游標在螢幕座標中的位置。

span.span: Gets the position of the mouse cursor in screen coordinates.

value.span: ，包含與螢幕左上角相對的滑鼠游標座標。

span.span: A that contains the coordinates of the mouse cursor relative to the upper-left corner of the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回表示滑鼠游標位置時被參考的屬性。The property returns a that represents the mouse cursor position at the time the property was referenced. 表示在畫面上，不是相對於控制項的位置座標，以及不論是否將游標放在控制項上時，都會傳回。The coordinates indicate the position on the screen, not relative to the control, and are returned regardless of whether the cursor is positioned over the control. 螢幕左上角的座標是 0，0。The coordinates of the upper-left corner of the screen are 0,0. 屬性等同於屬性。The property is identical to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將成可編輯狀態時使用者按下 ALT + E 時滑鼠游標位於樹狀節點標籤。The following code example puts a label into an editable state when the user presses ALT+E while the mouse cursor is over the tree node. 在使用者完成之後編輯標籤時，無法編輯標籤再次直到再次按下 ALT + E 按鍵組合。After the user is done editing the label, the labels cannot be edited again until the ALT+E key combination is pressed again. 這個範例需要您有上。This example requires that you have a on a . 樹狀檢視也應該有至少一個中其集合。The tree view should also have at least one in its collection. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseWheel As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於滑鼠滾輪移動且焦點在控制項時。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse wheel moves while the control has focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當處理事件，請務必遵循與滑鼠滾輪相關聯的使用者介面 (UI) 標準。When handling the event it is important to follow the user interface (UI) standards associated with the mouse wheel. 屬性值，指出已移動滑鼠滾輪的量。The property value indicates the amount the mouse wheel has been moved. 當累積的差異是加號或減號 120 時，應該捲動 UI。The UI should scroll when the accumulated delta is plus or minus 120. UI 應該捲動的邏輯所傳回的行數達到每個差異值的屬性。The UI should scroll the number of logical lines returned by the property for every delta value reached. 您也可以捲動更平順地在較小 120 單位增加，不過比率應該維持不變，也就是每 120 差異單位滾輪捲動的行。You can also scroll more smoothly in smaller that 120 unit increments, however the ratio should remain constant, that is lines scrolled per 120 delta units of wheel movement. 如需處理滑鼠滾輪訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱[WM_MOUSEWHEEL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms645617\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information about handling mouse wheel messages, see the[WM_MOUSEWHEEL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms645617\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topic. 滑鼠事件依下列順序發生：Mouse events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. / / 4. 5. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用不同的滑鼠事件上繪製的路徑滑鼠。The following code example demonstrates using different mouse events to draw the path of the mouse on a . 直線線段加入每個和所發生的事件。A line segment is added to the for each and events that occur. 若要更新圖形，方法針對呼叫每`MouseDown`和`MouseUp`事件。To update the graphics, the method is called for the on each `MouseDown` and `MouseUp` event. 此外，圖形的路徑會捲動向上或向下時就會發生事件。In addition, the graphic path is scrolled up or down when the event occurs. 其他的滑鼠事件，例如，以及螢幕上所識別。Additional mouse events, like , are identified on screen as well. 也會顯示在螢幕上會從滑鼠相關的其他資訊類別。Also displayed on the screen is additional information about the mouse from the class. summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the control.

value.span: 控制項的名稱。

span.span: The name of the control.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以在執行階段中用來評估物件，依名稱而不是類型和程式設計名稱。The property can be used at run time to evaluate the object by name rather than type and programmatic name. 因為屬性會傳回型別，可以依照案例樣式邏輯陳述式進行評估 (`Select`陳述式中的[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，`switch`陳述式中的[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)])。Because the property returns a type, it can be evaluated in case-style logic statements (`Select` statement in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `switch` statement in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[vcprvc](~/includes/vcprvc-md.md)]). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的控制項時新增或移除從表單控制項。The following code example displays the of a control in a when the control is added or removed from a form. [!code-cpp[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.ControlRemoved#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.ControlRemoved/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時屬性值變更。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更至如果數值為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自類別。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class.
