remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時屬性值變更。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName* `Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更至如果數值為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自類別。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

Protected Overridable Sub OnNotifyMessage (m As Message)

span.span: A that represents the Windows message.

summary.span: 將 Windows 訊息通知控制項。

span.span: Notifies the control of Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法時若控制項的`EnableNotifyMessage`樣式位元會設。The method is called if the control's `EnableNotifyMessage` style bit is set in . `EnableNotifyMessage`中設定樣式啟用時通知控制項方法會接收 Windows 訊息。The `EnableNotifyMessage` style in enables the control to be notified when the method receives a Windows message. 使用此方法，非完全信任的控制項可以接聽 Windows 訊息，而不讓他們能夠修改訊息。With this method, semi-trusted controls can listen for Windows messages without enabling them to modify the message.

para.span: 在覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法不需要，因為沒有初始的實作。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, calling the base class's method is not necessary because there is no initial implementation.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者將是影像或影像檔案拖曳至表單，並將其顯示在其上卸除的點。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on which it is dropped. 表單繪製每次重新繪製影像會覆寫方法; 否則為映像就只會一直保存到下一步 重新繪製。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件處理方法判斷被拖曳至表單的資料類型，並提供適當的回應。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件處理方法會顯示在表單中，影像如果可以從資料建立。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因為和值螢幕座標，這個範例會使用方法，將它們轉換為用戶端座標。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時屬性值變更。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更至如果數值為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自類別。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

summary.span: 當控制項容器的 屬性值變更時，會引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event when the property value of the control's container changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時屬性值變更。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更至如果數值為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自類別。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CPP/onpropertychangedevents.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/CS/onpropertychangedevents.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control_OnPropertyChangedEvents/VB/onpropertychangedevents.vb#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法也可讓衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是事件引發的方法，是執行時屬性值變更。The following code example is an event-raising method that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數種方法具有名稱模式`On` *PropertyName* `Changed` ，會引發對應的*PropertyName* `Changed`事件時*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern `On`*PropertyName*`Changed` that raise the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event when the *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的衍生的類別顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a derived class displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更至如果數值為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 這個範例需要您具有類別衍生自類別。This example requires that you have a class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 生於重繪控制項時，就會引發事件。The event is raised when the control is redrawn. 它的執行個體傳遞要處理的方法事件。It passes an instance of to the method(s) that handles the event. 當建立新的自訂控制項或繼承的控制項使用不同的視覺外觀，您必須提供程式碼，以呈現控制項，藉由覆寫方法。When creating a new custom control or an inherited control with a different visual appearance, you must provide code to render the control by overriding the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[覆寫 OnPaint 方法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/overriding-the-onpaint-method.md)和[自訂控制項繪製和轉譯](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/custom-control-painting-and-rendering.md)。For more information, see [Overriding the OnPaint Method](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/overriding-the-onpaint-method.md) and [Custom Control Painting and Rendering](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/custom-control-painting-and-rendering.md). 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立控制項在表單和使用繪製它的事件。The following code example creates a control on the form and uses the event to draw to it. summary.span: 將指定的螢幕點的位置計算為工作區座標 (Client Coordinate)。

span.span: Computes the location of the specified screen point into client coordinates.

returns.span: ，以工作區座標表示的轉換後 ()。

span.span: A that represents the converted , , in client coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會啟用卸除使用者將是影像或影像檔案拖曳至表單，並將其顯示在其上的點。The following code example enables the user to drag an image or image file onto the form, and have it be displayed at the point on it is dropped. 表單繪製每次重新繪製影像會覆寫方法; 否則為映像就只會一直保存到下一步 重新繪製。The method is overridden to repaint the image each time the form is painted; otherwise the image would only persist until the next repainting. 事件處理方法判斷被拖曳至表單的資料類型，並提供適當的回應。The event-handling method determines the type of data being dragged into the form and provides the appropriate feedback. 事件處理方法會顯示在表單中，影像如果可以從資料建立。The event-handling method displays the image on the form, if an can be created from the data. 因為和值螢幕座標，這個範例會使用方法，將它們轉換為用戶端座標。Because the and values are screen coordinates, the example uses the method to convert them to client coordinates. remarks.format: ## Remarks 會呼叫預先處理輸入的訊息，再分派這些應用程式的訊息迴圈。 is called by the application's message loop to preprocess input messages before they are dispatched. 可能值`msg`參數是 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_CHAR 和 WM_SYSCHAR。Possible values for the `msg` parameter are WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_CHAR, and WM_SYSCHAR. 在覆寫，控制項應該傳回`true`指出它已處理訊息。When overriding , a control should return `true` to indicate that it has processed the message. 控制項的結果不會處理的訊息`base.PreProcessMessage`應該傳回。For messages that are not processed by the control, the result of `base.PreProcessMessage` should be returned. 控制項將通常會覆寫其中一個更具特製化的方法如， ， ， ，或而不是覆寫。Controls will typically override one of the more specialized methods such as , , , , or instead of overriding .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewKeyDown As PreviewKeyDownEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於焦點位於這個控制項上時並按下鍵盤按鍵的 事件之前。

span.span: Occurs before the event when a key is pressed while focus is on this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些按鍵，例如索引標籤、 RETURN、 esc 鍵和方向鍵，某些控制項通常會忽略，因為它們不會被視為輸入的按鍵。Some key presses, such as the TAB, RETURN, ESC, and arrow keys, are typically ignored by some controls because they are not considered input key presses. 例如，根據預設，忽略的箭頭按鍵的控制項。For example, by default, a control ignores the arrow keys. 按下方向鍵時，通常會導致焦點移到上一個或下一個控制項。Pressing the arrow keys typically causes the focus to move to the previous or next control. 使用方向鍵來瀏覽鍵並按下這些機碼通常不會引發視為事件。The arrow keys are considered navigation keys and pressing these keys typically do not raise the event for a . 不過，按箭號的索引鍵未引發事件。However, pressing the arrow keys for a does raise the event. 藉由處理事件和設定屬性`true`，您可以提高事件時按下方向鍵。By handling the event for a and setting the property to `true`, you can raise the event when the arrow keys are pressed. 不過，如果您要處理的箭頭按鍵，將不會再將焦點移至前一個或下一個控制項。However, if you handle the arrow keys, the focus will no longer move to the previous or next control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範包含。The following code example demonstrates a that includes a . 當擁有焦點且按向上鍵或向下鍵，隨即出現。When the has the focus and you press the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys, the appears. 按下向上或向下鍵時偵測到事件處理常式，並設定屬性`true`。The event handler detects when the UP ARROW or DOWN ARROW keys are pressed and sets the property to `true`. 這會引發事件，以便您可以顯示。This raises the event so that you can display the . 您不應該將任何邏輯放在事件處理常式，而不是要設定屬性。You should not put any logic in the event handler, other than to set the property. 相反地，您應該將您的邏輯放在事件處理常式。Instead, you should put your logic in the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.previewkeydown/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/system.windows.forms.control.previewkeydown/vb/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法是在處理命令的索引鍵前置處理的訊息。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令索引鍵是一律優先於一般輸入索引鍵的索引鍵。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令索引鍵的範例包括加速器及功能表快速鍵。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 此方法必須傳回`true`指出它已處理命令按鍵，或`false`表示索引鍵不命令按鍵。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control. 方法會先判斷控制項是否有，若是如此，可讓和處理命令按鍵。The method first determines whether the control has a , and if so, enables the to process the command key. 如果命令按鍵不功能表快顯控制項具有父代，金鑰會傳遞給父方法。If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's method. 最後的結果會是索引鍵 「 昇 」 在控制項階層架構該命令。The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy. 除了使用者按下索引鍵，索引鍵的資料也會指出它，如果有的話，在按下輔助按鍵做為索引鍵相同的時間。In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key. 輔助按鍵包含 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 鍵。Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息以處理對話方塊字元，例如控制項的助憶鍵前置處理期間，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters, such as control mnemonics. 只有當呼叫這個方法方法表示控制項未處理的字元。This method is called only if the method indicates that the control is not processing the character. 方法只是傳送至父代的字元方法或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。The method simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊字元。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog characters. 當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項時，只會呼叫這個方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法稱為由子控制項的子控制項收到鍵盤訊息。This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message. 子控制項產生訊息的任何鍵盤事件之前呼叫這個方法。The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message. 如果此方法傳回`true`，子控制項處理的訊息會考量並不會產生任何鍵盤事件。If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message processed and does not generate any keyboard events. `m`參數包含要預覽的視窗訊息。The `m` parameter contains the window message to preview. 可能值屬性是 WM_CHAR、 WM_KEYDOWN、 WM_SYSKEYDOWN、 WM_KEYUP 和 WM_SYSKEYUP。Possible values for the property are WM_CHAR, WM_KEYDOWN, WM_SYSKEYDOWN, WM_KEYUP, and WM_SYSKEYUP. 方法只是傳送至父代的字元方法或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。The method simply sends the character to the parent's method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent. 類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。The class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog keys.

summary.span: 處理助憶鍵字元。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法被呼叫要讓控制項有機會處理助憶鍵字元。This method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 這個方法應判斷控制項是否處於處理助憶鍵的狀態，而且是否指定的字元是否表示助憶鍵。The method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 實作這個方法通常會使用方法來判斷指定的字元是否符合控制項的文字中的助憶鍵。Implementations of this method often use the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text. 例如: For example: ```csharp if (CanSelect && IsMnemonic(charCode, MyControl.Text) { // Perform action associated with mnemonic. } ``` 預設實作方法只會傳回`false`來表示控制項具有沒有助憶鍵。This default implementation of the method simply returns `false` to indicate that the control has no mnemonic. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範會覆寫 按鈕類別的延伸至展現自訂行為的方法。The following code example demonstrates an extension of the button class that overrides the method to exhibit custom behavior. 此範例也示範如何使用和屬性。The example also demonstrates the use of the and properties. 若要執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼的表單類別之後，在相同的檔案。To run this example paste the following code after a form class, in the same file. 加入按鈕的型別`MnemonicButton`至表單。Add a button of type `MnemonicButton` to the form. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProcessMnemonic/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryAccessibilityHelp As QueryAccessibilityHelpEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 為協助工具應用程式提供說明時。

span.span: Occurs when is providing help to accessibility applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該使用類別，讓使用者可以叫用可存取物件上的說明，請按 F1 鍵。You should use the class to enable users to invoke help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key. 使用中完整的資訊為您提供。Using the provides you with complete information in the . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不會不含任何內建的可存取資訊。Since the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因為這個緣故，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼摘錄示範處理事件。This code excerpt demonstrates handling the event. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryContinueDrag As QueryContinueDragEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於拖放作業時，讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。

span.span: Occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放作業期間鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更時，會引發事件。The event is raised when there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state during a drag-and-drop operation. 事件可讓拖曳來源能夠決定是否應取消拖放作業。The event enables the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled. 以下描述與拖放作業相關的事件，其引發的方法與時機。The following describes how and when events related to drag-and-drop operations are raised. 方法會判斷目前的游標位置下的控制項。The method determines the control under the current cursor location. 接著會檢查此控制項是否為有效的置放目標。It then checks to see if the control is a valid drop target. 如果控制項為有效的置放目標，指定的拖放效果引發事件。If the control is a valid drop target, the event is raised with the drag-and-drop effect specified. 如需拖放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of drag-and-drop effects, see the enumeration. 系統會追蹤滑鼠游標位置、鍵盤狀態和滑鼠按鈕狀態的變更。Changes in the mouse cursor position, keyboard state, and mouse button state are tracked. - 如果使用者移出視窗外，便會引發 事件。If the user moves out of a window, the event is raised. - 如果滑鼠進入另一個控制項，便會引發該控制項的 事件。If the mouse enters another control, the for that control is raised. - 如果滑鼠移動，但是待在相同的控制項內，便會引發 事件。If the mouse moves but stays within the same control, the event is raised. 如果沒有鍵盤或滑鼠按鈕狀態變更引發事件，並決定是否要繼續拖曳、 置放資料，或取消作業的值的事件屬性。If there is a change in the keyboard or mouse button state, the event is raised and determines whether to continue the drag, to drop the data, or to cancel the operation based on the value of the property of the event's . - 如果值是`Continue`、就會引發事件，以繼續作業而具有新效果就會引發事件，以便設定適當的視覺化回應。If the value of is `Continue`, the event is raised to continue the operation and the event is raised with the new effect so appropriate visual feedback can be set. 如需有效置放效果的清單，請參閱 列舉型別。For a list of valid drop effects, see the enumeration. > [!NOTE] > 和事件會經過配對，如此在滑鼠移動經過置放目標，不提供使用者最新的回應滑鼠的位置上。The and events are paired so that as the mouse moves across the drop target, the user is given the most up-to-date feedback on the mouse's position. - 如果值是`Drop`，置放效果值會傳回來源，如此來源應用程式可以執行適當作業資料來源; 例如，如果剪下資料作業是移動。If the value of is `Drop`, the drop effect value is returned to the source, so the source application can perform the appropriate operation on the source data; for example, cut the data if the operation was a move. - 如果值是`Cancel`、就會引發事件。If the value of is `Cancel`, the event is raised. 根據預設，事件設定至`Cancel`中如果按下 ESC 鍵，並設定至`Drop`中按下滑鼠左、 置中 或右鍵時。By default, the event sets to `Cancel` in if the ESC key was pressed and sets to `Drop` in if the left, middle, or right mouse button is pressed. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following code example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 範例會呼叫時拖曳動作開始的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例需要有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。The example requires that two cursor files,`3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自訂的資料指標中所設定事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤的狀態會在評估右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based on state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在設`None`中。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to `None` in . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用事件。This code excerpt demonstrates using the event. 請參閱完整程式碼範例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 視窗區域是像素為單位，其中作業系統允許繪製視窗內的集合。The window region is a collection of pixels within the window where the operating system permits drawing. 作業系統不會顯示在視窗的視窗區域外部的任何部分。The operating system does not display any portion of a window that lies outside of the window region. 控制項的座標是區域的相對於控制項，而非工作區控制項的左上角。The coordinates of a control's region are relative to the upper-left corner of the control, not the client area of the control. > [!NOTE] > 可以是不連續的像素區域中包含的集合。The collection of pixels contained with the region can be noncontiguous. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用藉由建立圓形按鈕的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property by creating a round button. 要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼形式，其中包含呼叫的按鈕`roundButton`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a button called `roundButton`. 這個範例需要事件已連線到此範例中定義的事件處理常式。This example requires that the event is connected to the event handler defined in the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷的調整大小的控制項，您可以轉型`sender`參數的已註冊方法並取得其屬性 (或和屬性個別）。To determine the of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the registered method to a and get its property (or and properties individually). 若要處理自訂版面配置，使用而不是調整大小事件的事件。To handle custom layouts, use the event instead of the Resize event. 引發以回應事件，但也在其他會影響控制項的配置變更回應。The event is raised in response to a event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件。The following code example handles the event of a . 重新調整表單大小，此事件處理常式可確保表單出現方形 (其和仍相同)。When the form is resized, the event handler ensures that the form stays square (its and remain equal). 若要執行此範例中，請確定，然後將此事件處理方法產生關聯的表單事件。To run this example, make sure and associate this event-handling method with the form’s event. summary.span: 繼續平常的配置邏輯。

span.span: Resumes usual layout logic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法不論是否有任何暫止配置要求，強制立即配置。Calling the method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests. 和一起用來隱藏多個方法是事件而調整控制項的多個屬性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，您通常會呼叫方法，然後設定， ， ，或屬性的控制項，然後再呼叫方法，讓變更生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必須有任何暫止呼叫如成功呼叫。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將兩個按鈕加入至表單。The following code example adds two buttons to a form. 範例交易使用的按鈕加入和方法。The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the and methods. span.span: Resumes usual layout logic, optionally forcing an immediate layout of pending layout requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法不論是否有任何暫止配置要求，強制立即配置。Calling the method forces an immediate layout if there are any pending layout requests. 當`performLayout`參數設定為`true`，如果有任何暫止配置要求，就會發生的立即配置。When the `performLayout` parameter is set to `true`, an immediate layout occurs if there are any pending layout requests. 和一起用來隱藏多個方法是事件而調整控制項的多個屬性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，您通常會呼叫方法，然後設定， ， ，或屬性的控制項，然後再呼叫方法，讓變更生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必須有任何暫止呼叫如成功呼叫。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. > [!NOTE] > 將數個控制項加入至父控制項，建議您呼叫方法初始化加入的控制項之前。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 將控制項加入至父控制項之後, 呼叫方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 這會增加具有許多控制項的應用程式的效能。This will increase the performance of applications with many controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 屬性可用於國際應用程式的語言由右至左，例如希伯來文或阿拉伯文的寫入位置。The property is used for international applications where the language is written from right to left, such as Hebrew or Arabic. 當這個屬性設定為，包含文字的控制項項目會由右至左顯示。When this property is set to , control elements that include text are displayed from right to left. > [!NOTE] > 如果值屬性在執行階段變更，但不含格式只未經處理的文字會保留。If the value of the property is changed at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved. 以下是幾個範例的控制項項目會受到屬性值為:The following are a few examples of how control elements are affected by the property value of : - 垂直捲軸會顯示在左邊，而不是可捲動的控制項的右端 (例如， ， 、 多行，和)。Vertical scroll bars are displayed on the left side rather than right side of scrollable controls (for example, , , multiline , and ). - 水平捲軸的開頭為靠右對齊的捲動方塊 （捲動方塊）。Horizontal scroll bars start with the scroll box (thumb) right-aligned. - 所控制的核取方塊項目對齊`CheckAlign`屬性，為反轉和控制項。The check box element alignment, controlled by the `CheckAlign` property, is reversed for and controls. - 清單方塊、 下拉式方塊和上下按鈕控制項中的項目會靠右對齊。Items in list box, combo box, and up-down controls are right aligned. - 上下按鈕是 靠左對齊上和控制項。Up and down buttons are left-aligned on and controls. - 功能表 (， ，和) 會顯示為靠右對齊。Menus (, , and ) are displayed right-aligned. - 在工具列按鈕的對齊方式控制項或上的文字對齊不會受到屬性。The alignment of toolbar buttons on a control or the alignment of text on a is not affected by the property. - 支援由右至左對齊。不過，對 ActiveX 控制項的影響取決於控制項作者實作支援由右至左顯示的範圍。 supports right-to-left alignment; however, the effect on an ActiveX control depends on the extent to which the control author implemented support for right-to-left display.

span.span: Occurs when the property value changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會為事件處理常式時執行屬性值變更。The following code example is an event handler that is executed when the property value changes. 類別有數種方法具有名稱模式*PropertyName* `Changed`所引發的時機對應*PropertyName*值變更 (*PropertyName*代表對應屬性的名稱)。The class has several methods with the name pattern *PropertyName*`Changed` that are raised when the corresponding *PropertyName* value changes (*PropertyName* represents the name of the corresponding property). 下列程式碼範例會變更的顯示貨幣資料。The following code example changes the of a displaying currency data. 此範例會將文字轉換成十進位數字和變更至如果數值為負數，如果數字為正數。The example converts the text to a decimal number and changes the to if the number is negative and to if the number is positive. 這個範例需要您有包含。This example requires that you have a that contains a . remarks.format: ## Remarks `directed`和`forward`容器樣式控制項使用的參數。The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls. 當`directed`參數設定為`true`、`forward`參數進行評估以判斷哪一個控制項來選取。When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select. 當`forward`設為`true`，定位順序中的下一個控制項已選取; 當`false`，選取先前的控制項定位順序中。When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected. 方法啟動控制項，如果控制項的`Selectable`樣式位元會設為`true`中、 它包含在另一個控制項和所有其父控制項都是可見並已啟用。The method activates the control if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in , it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 下列清單中的 Windows Form 控制項不能選取。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 從清單中的控制項衍生控制項也不會選取。Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable. - - - - - - - （如果沒有在控制項中顯示連結） (when there is no link present in the control)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法啟動的下一個控制項定位順序中，如果控制項的`Selectable`樣式位元會設為`true`中、 它包含在另一個控制項和所有其父控制項都是可見並已啟用。The method activates the next control in the tab order if the control's `Selectable` style bit is set to `true` in , it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled. 下列清單中的 Windows Form 控制項不能選取。The Windows Forms controls in the following list are not selectable. 從清單中的控制項衍生控制項也不會選取。Controls derived from controls in the list will also not be selectable. - - - - - - - （如果沒有在控制項中顯示連結） (when there is no link present in the control) 當您藉由呼叫中使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等） 變更焦點時或方法，或藉由設定屬性目前的表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`、和事件都會被隱藏。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範某些控制項的表單中使用的方法。The following code exampleshows the method being used in a form that has some controls. 每次您按一下表單上，啟動下一個控制項。Each time that you click the form, the next control is activated. 屬性會取得目前作用中控制項的容器控制項中。The property gets the currently active control in the container control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 將控制項移到疊置順序最下層。The control is moved to the back of the z-order. 如果控制項是其他控制項的子系，子控制項移動到疊置順序最下層。If the control is a child of another control, the child control is moved to the back of the z-order. 如果控制項是最上層控制項，這個方法無法正常運作除非控制項為作用中。If the control is a top-level control, this method will not work correctly unless the control is active. 最上層控制項是一個控制項，例如，也就是沒有子系的另一個控制項。A top-level control is a control, such as a , that is not a child of another control. 現用控制項是可見的控制項，具有輸入焦點。An active control is a visible control that has input focus. 若要使用方法與非作用中、 最上層控制項，先呼叫控制項上的方法。To use the method with an inactive, top-level control, first call the method on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項樣式位元旗標用來支援的行為分類。Control style bit flags are used to categorize supported behavior. 控制項可以藉由呼叫啟用樣式方法並傳入適當位元 （或位元） 及要設為位元的布林值。A control can enable a style by calling the method and passing in the appropriate bit (or bits) and the Boolean value to set the bit(s) to. 若要判斷指派給指定的值位元，請使用方法並傳入成員來評估。To determine the value assigned to a specified bit, use the method and pass in the member to evaluate. > [!CAUTION] > 設定控制項樣式位元，可以大幅變更控制項的行為。Setting the control style bits can substantially change the behavior of the control. 檢閱列舉文件以了解變更控制項樣式位元，然後再呼叫的效果方法。Review the enumeration documentation to understand the effects of changing the control style bits before calling the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓在雙重緩衝並更新以反映變更的樣式。The following code example enables double-buffering on a and updates the styles to reflect the changes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為類別是實值類型 (`Structure`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，`struct`中[!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)])，它會傳回值，表示存取屬性會傳回控制項大小的複本。Because the class is a value type (`Structure` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], `struct` in [!INCLUDE[csprcs](~/includes/csprcs-md.md)]), it is returned by value, meaning accessing the property returns a copy of the size of the control. 因此，調整或屬性傳回從這個屬性將不會影響或的控制項。So, adjusting the or properties of the returned from this property will not affect the or of the control. 若要調整或的控制項，您必須設定控制項的或屬性或 set與新的屬性。To adjust the or of the control, you must set the control's or property, or set the property with a new . > [!NOTE] > 若要維持較佳的效能，請勿設定其建構函式中的控制項。To maintain better performance, do not set the of a control in its constructor. 慣用的方法是覆寫屬性。The preferred method is to override the property. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Server 2003 系統上，大小受到最大像素寬度和高度的監視。On Windows Server 2003 systems, the size of a is restricted by the maximum pixel width and height of the monitor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將至表單，並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 此範例錨定至表單的右下角的按鈕，以便調整表單大小時，則會保持其相對位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下來設定並調整大小的按鈕，以做為相同大小。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 範例接著會設定至`true`並設定屬性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最後，它會加入事件處理常式來處理按鈕的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 這個範例需要您有名為`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#3)]

summary.span: 發生在 屬性值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property value changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最好是使用事件，以處理自訂版面配置。It is preferable to use the event to handle custom layouts. 引發以回應事件，但也在其他條件時可能需要套用的版面配置。The event is raised in response to events, but also in other conditions when layout might need to be applied. 如果會引發這個事件以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範事件。The following code example demonstrates the event. 執行個體已經提供的可以水平及垂直縮放控制項。An instance of a control has been provided that can be scaled both horizontally and vertically. A執行個體會提供水平及垂直的小數位數值。A instance provides the horizontal and vertical scale value. 名為執行個體**確定**用來設定的標尺值控制項執行個體。The instance named **OK** is used to set the scale values for the control instance. 每當控制項的大小變更時，相關聯的事件處理常式稱為控制項的事件。Whenever the size of the control changes, the event handler associated with the event of the control is called. 這個事件處理常式會顯示訊息方塊，指出控制項的大小已變更。This event handler displays a message box indicating that the size of the control has changed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會發生事件時旗標已加入或變更。The event occurs when flags have been added or changed. 如果控制項樣式變更以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動，就會引發這個事件。This event is raised if the control style is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 暫停控制項的配置邏輯。

span.span: Temporarily suspends the layout logic for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的配置邏輯已暫止，直到方法呼叫。The layout logic of the control is suspended until the method is called. 和一起用來隱藏多個方法是事件而調整控制項的多個屬性。The and methods are used in tandem to suppress multiple events while you adjust multiple attributes of the control. 例如，您通常會呼叫方法，然後設定， ， ，或屬性的控制項，然後再呼叫方法，讓變更生效。For example, you would typically call the method, then set the , , , or properties of the control, and then call the method to enable the changes to take effect. 必須有任何暫止呼叫如成功呼叫。There must be no pending calls to for to be successfully called. > [!NOTE] > 將數個控制項加入至父控制項，建議您呼叫方法初始化加入的控制項之前。When adding several controls to a parent control, it is recommended that you call the method before initializing the controls to be added. 將控制項加入至父控制項之後, 呼叫方法。After adding the controls to the parent control, call the method. 這會增加具有許多控制項的應用程式的效能。This will increase the performance of applications with many controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將兩個按鈕加入至表單。The following code example adds two buttons to a form. 範例交易使用的按鈕加入和方法。The example transactions the addition of the buttons by using the and methods. MemberSignature.Value: public: property int TabIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項容器中的控制項定位順序。

span.span: Gets or sets the tab order of the control within its container.

value.span: 在控制項集合內的控制項之索引值 (在其容器內)。

span.span: The index value of the control within the set of controls within its container.

value.span: 容器內的控制項會包含在定位順序中。

span.span: The controls in the container are included in the tab order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定位點索引可以包含任何有效的整數大於或等於零，較低的數字，在稍早在定位順序。A tab index can consist of any valid integer greater than or equal to zero, lower numbers being earlier in the tab order. 如果在相同的父控制項上的多個控制項具有相同的索引，控制項疊置順序會決定的順序，以循環的控制項。If more than one control on the same parent control has the same tab index, the z-order of the controls determines the order to cycle through the controls. 控制項的定位順序，包含其屬性必須設定為`true`。For a control to be included in the tab order, its property must be set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將至表單，並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 此範例錨定至表單的右下角的按鈕，以便調整表單大小時，則會保持其相對位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下來設定並調整大小的按鈕，以做為相同大小。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 範例接著會設定至`true`並設定屬性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最後，它會加入事件處理常式來處理按鈕的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 這個範例需要您有名為`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否能使用 TAB 鍵，將焦點 (Focus) 給予這個控制項。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按下 TAB 鍵時，則會將輸入的焦點設定為定位順序中的下一個控制項。When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order. 控制與屬性值為`false`未被納入的定位順序中的控制項集合。Controls with the property value of `false` are not included in the collection of controls in the tab order. 定位順序都可以藉由設定控制項的操作屬性值。The tab order can be manipulated by setting the control's property value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將至表單，並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example adds a to a form and sets some of its common properties. 此範例錨定至表單的右下角的按鈕，以便調整表單大小時，則會保持其相對位置。The example anchors the button to the bottom-right corner of the form so it keeps its relative position as the form is resized. 接下來設定並調整大小的按鈕，以做為相同大小。Next it sets the and resizes the button to the same size as the . 範例接著會設定至`true`並設定屬性。The example then sets the to `true` and sets the property. 最後，它會加入事件處理常式來處理按鈕的事件。Lastly, it adds an event handler to handle the event of the button. 這個範例需要您有名為`imageList1`。This example requires that you have an named `imageList1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生型別類別可以指派給這個屬性。Any type derived from the class can be assigned to this property. 如果屬性透過 Windows Form 設計工具設定，可以指定只會將文字。If the property is set through the Windows Forms designer, only text can be assigned. 常見用途屬性是儲存緊密地與控制項相關聯的資料。A common use for the property is to store data that is closely associated with the control. 例如，如果您有顯示客戶的相關資訊的控制項，您可能會儲存，其中包含該控制項中的客戶的訂單記錄屬性，以便快速存取資料。For example, if you have a control that displays information about a customer, you might store a that contains the customer's order history in that control's property so the data can be accessed quickly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示表單，並將`Customer`中其屬性。The following code example displays a form and stores a `Customer` in its property. 這個範例需要您已定義的類別，衍生自名為`CustomerForm`和您定義`Customer`。This example requires that you have defined a class that derives from named `CustomerForm` and that you have defined a `Customer`. span.span: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.

value.span: 與這個控制項關聯的文字。

span.span: The text associated with this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的屬性在每個衍生類別中有不同的使用方式。The property of the control is used differently by each derived class. 例如屬性會顯示在表單頂端的標題列、 非常少的字元計數和通常會顯示應用程式或文件的名稱。For example the property of a is displayed in the title bar at the top of the form, is fairly small in character count, and usually displays the application or document name. 不過，屬性可能很大，而且可包含許多用來格式化文字的隱藏字元。However, the property of a can be large and can include numerous nonvisual characters used to format the text. 例如，將中顯示的文字可以藉由調整格式化屬性，或加上空格或定位字元對齊的文字。For example, the text displayed in a can be formatted by adjusting the properties, or by the addition of spaces or tab characters to align the text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並設定一些常見的屬性。The following code example creates a and sets some of its common properties. 此範例會建立並設定其群組方塊內。The example creates a and sets its within the group box. 接下來，設定屬性群組 方塊中，群組方塊的停駐在表單頂端。Next, it sets the property of the group box, and docks the group box to the top of the form. 最後，它會停用 [群組] 方塊設定屬性`false`，因而導致停用群組內包含的所有控制項。Lastly, it disables the group box by setting the property to `false`, which causes all controls contained within the group box to be disabled. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#2)]

span.span: When overriding the property in a derived class, use the base class's property to extend the base implementation.

para.span: 否則，您必須提供所有的實作。

span.span: Otherwise, you must provide all the implementation.

para.span: 您不需要覆寫兩個和存取子屬性; 您可以覆寫只能有一個必要。

span.span: You are not required to override both the and accessors of the property; you can override only one if needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值相當於屬性控制項的屬性值。The property value is equivalent to the property of the property value of the control. 所做的變更和屬性值會使變更控制項的屬性值。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the control to change. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立三個表單上的控制項，並將其大小和位置設定使用的各種大小與和位置相關的屬性。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 這個範例需要您有有寬度和高度的最少 300 像素為單位。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. remarks.format: ## Remarks 最上層控制項定義為父控制項的不由另一個 Windows Form 控制項的父代。The top-level control is defined as the parent control that is not parented by another Windows Forms control. 通常，這會是內含控制項最外層的 。Typically, this is the outermost that the control is contained in. 例如，如果內含控制項上的 MDI 子系，那麼最上層控制項是多個文件介面 (MDI) 父。For example, if the control is contained on an MDI child , then the top-level control is the Multiple Document Interface (MDI) parent . 如果控制項不父代上，這個屬性會傳回`null`。If the control is not parented on a , this property will return `null`.

summary.span: 使控制項重繪其工作區內的失效區域。

span.span: Causes the control to redraw the invalidated regions within its client area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行繪製的任何暫止要求。Executes any pending requests for painting. 有兩種方式來重新繪製的表單和其內容：There are two ways to repaint a form and its contents: - 您可以使用其中一個多載的方法方法。You can use one of the overloads of the method with the method. - 您可以呼叫方法強制將控制項重繪本身及其所有子系。You can call the method, which forces the control to redraw itself and all its children. 這相當於設定方法`true`，並使用它與。This is equivalent to setting the method to `true` and using it with . 方法控制什麼取得繪製，或重新繪製。The method governs what gets painted or repainted. 方法控制繪製或 repainting 時。The method governs when the painting or repainting occurs. 如果您使用和方法放在一起，而不是呼叫，什麼取得繪製取決於哪一個多載您使用。If you use the and methods together rather than calling , what gets repainted depends on which overload of you use. 方法只會強制控制項將立即繪製但方法可讓您控制哪些取得繪製呼叫時方法。The method just forces the control to be painted immediately, but the method governs what gets painted when you call the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WM_PAINT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145213\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the[WM_PAINT](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145213\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每當您執行的作業採用可觀的時間，請使用等待游標。不過請注意會阻擋 UI 執行緒的作業也會封鎖 acursor 變更。因此，在另一個執行緒中執行這些耗時的作業時，應該只使用這個屬性。Use a wait cursor whenever you perform an operation that takes a noticeable amount of time.However, note that operations that block the UI thread will also block acursor change.Therefore, this property should only be used when performing time-consuming operations in another thread. 若要變更資料指標，全域和立即，seethe屬性。To change the cursor globally and immediately, seethe property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您藉由呼叫中使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等） 變更焦點時或方法，或藉由設定屬性目前的表單，焦點事件會發生順序如下：When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the or methods, or by setting the property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生：When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the method, focus events occur in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 如果屬性設定為`false`、和事件都會被隱藏。If the property is set to `false`, the and events are suppressed. 如果屬性設`true`中事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件事件都會被隱藏。If the property of the is set to `true` in the event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the event are suppressed. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿嘗試將焦點設在， ， ， ， ，或事件處理常式。Do not attempt to set focus from within the , , , , , or event handlers. 如此一來，可能會導致您的應用程式或作業系統停止回應。Doing so can cause your application or the operating system to stop responding. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題和 「 訊息死結 」 一節[有關訊息和訊息佇列](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx)主題。For more information, see the[WM_KILLFOCUS](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)topic, and the "Message Deadlocks" section of the [About Messages and Message Queues](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms644927\(v=vs.85\).aspx) topic. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別並驗證使用者輸入電子郵件地址。The following code example uses the derived class and validates an email address that the user enters. 如果電子郵件地址不是標準格式 (包含"@" and "。")，驗證失敗，圖示會顯示，而且在取消事件。If the email address is not in the standard format (containing "@" and "."), the validation fails, an icon is displayed, and the event is canceled. 這個範例需要和控制項在表單上建立。This example requires that a and control have been created on a form. summary.span: 發生在 屬性值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property value changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果會引發這個事件以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。This event is raised if the property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會引發事件時屬性值為控制項已變更。The following code example raises the event when the property value of the control has changed. [!code-cpp[Control_VisibleChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_VisibleChanged/CPP/control_visiblechanged.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control_VisibleChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_VisibleChanged/CS/control_visiblechanged.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control_VisibleChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control_VisibleChanged/VB/control_visiblechanged.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Width { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the control.

value.span: 控制項的寬度 (單位為像素)。

span.span: The width of the control in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所做的變更和屬性值會使變更控制項的屬性值。Changes made to the and property values cause the property value of the control to change. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立三個表單上的控制項，並將其大小和位置設定使用的各種大小與和位置相關的屬性。The following code example creates three controls on a form and sets their size and location by using the various size-related and location-related properties. 這個範例需要您有有寬度和高度的最少 300 像素為單位。This example requires that you have a that has a width and height of at least 300 pixels. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CPP/controlsizelocation.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/CS/controlsizelocation.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control SizeLocation/VB/controlsizelocation.vb#1)]

span.span: The Windows to process.

summary.span: 處理 Windows 訊息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有訊息都會都傳送至方法之後被篩透過方法。All messages are sent to the method after getting filtered through the method. 方法完全對應於 Windows `WindowProc` 函式。The method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function. 如需有關如何處理 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱[WindowProc 函式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565)。For more information about processing Windows messages, see the [WindowProc function](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=181565). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法以處理作業系統訊息中識別結構。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to handle operating system messages identified in the structure. [WM_ACTIVATEAPP](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)作業系統訊息在此範例中了解當另一個應用程式會變成作用中處理。The[WM_ACTIVATEAPP](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ms632614\(v=vs.85\).aspx)operating system message is handled in this example to know when another application is becoming active. 請參閱下列主題，以了解可用， ，和值。See the following topics to understand the available , , and values. 實際的常數值可以找到 Windows.h 標頭檔中。Actual constant values can be found in the Windows.h header file. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.

permission.span: 關聯的列舉型別：。

para.span: 繼承的控制項，應該呼叫基底類別的方法來處理未處理任何訊息。

span.span: Inheriting controls should call the base class's method to process any messages that they do not handle.
